<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block>
<label>&sect;</label>
<designator>31:27</designator>
<name>Checklist<sep/> Matters to include in an application for registration of solicitation</name>
</outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>CHK</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<check.list>
<list list.style="para">
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>1</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|27|31:27">
<para.text>Name of the organization and the name or names under which it intends to solicit contributions.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>2</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|27|31:27">
<para.text>The names and business, residence, or other addresses where each can regularly be found of the officers, directors, trustees, and executive personnel of the organization.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>3</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|27|31:27">
<para.text>Addresses of the organization, including addresses of any offices within the state.</para.text>
</para>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|27|31:27">
<para.text>If the organization does not maintain an office, include the name and address of the person having custody of its financial records.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>4</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|27|31:27">
<para.text>Statement as to where and when the organization was established, its form of organization, and its tax exempt status. The form must include a copy of the most recent letter of exemption, if any, issued by the Internal Revenue Service, the most recent communication from the Internal Revenue Service regarding any audit thereby, if any, and a copy of any organizational documents, such as the certificate of incorporation, bylaws, and amendments to those documents.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>5</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|27|31:27">
<para.text>A clear description of the specific programs for which the solicited contributions will be used, and a statement as to whether those programs are in existence or planned.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>6</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|27|31:27">
<para.text>Date on which the fiscal year of the organization ends.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>7</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|27|31:27">
<para.text>Statement as to whether the organization is authorized by any other governmental authority to solicit contributions.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>8</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|27|31:27">
<para.text>Statement as to whether the organization is authorized by any other governmental authority to solicit contributions and whether it or any of its present officers, directors, executive personnel, or trustees are or have ever been fined or otherwise penalized or enjoined from soliciting contributions or have been found to have engaged in unlawful practices regarding solicitation of contributions or administration of charitable assets and whether its registration or license has been suspended or cancelled by any court or other governmental agency together with the identity of such courts or governmental agencies and the reasons for such fine, penalty, injunction, suspension, or cancellation.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>9</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|27|31:27">
<para.text>Names and addresses of any professional fundraisers, fundraising counsel, or commercial coventurers who are acting or who have agreed to act on behalf of the organization.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>10</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|27|31:27">
<para.text>A copy of the organization's annual report, if any, for the immediately preceding fiscal year.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>11</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|27|31:27">
<para.text>The names and addresses of any chapters, branches, affiliates, or organizations that share in the contributions or other revenue received in the state.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
</list>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|27|31:27">
<para.text>
See <st>Exec. Law &sect;172(1)</st>.
</para.text>
</para>
</note.group>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><tk>West's Key Number Digest, Charities &key;42</tk></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry date.trace="1"><ref.text><rc>N.Y. Jur. 2d, Charities &sect;85</rc></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>
</section.body>
</section>
<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block>
<label>&sect;</label>
<designator>31:28</designator>
<name>Checklist<sep/> Attachments to application for exemption from federal income taxation</name>
</outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>CHK</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<check.list>
<list list.style="para">
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>1</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|28|31:28">
<para.text>A copy of the organizing or enabling document that is signed by a principal officer or is accompanied by a written declaration signed by an authorized individual certifying that the document is a complete and accurate copy of the original or meets the requirements of a conformed copy.</para.text>
</para>
<list list.style="para">
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|28|31:28">
<para.text>If the organizing or enabling documents are articles of incorporation, evidence that it was filed and approved by a state official.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|28|31:28">
<para.text>A copy of the articles of incorporation can also be submitted with a written declaration signed by an authorized individual indicating the copy is complete and was filed and approved by the state, including the date filed.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
</list>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>2</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|28|31:28">
<para.text>A current copy of the bylaws or other rules of operation.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>3</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|28|31:28">
<para.text>A description of any prior income tax returns filed by the applicant.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>4</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|28|31:28">
<para.text>Balance sheets as of the end of each accounting year the applicant has been in existence for up to four years before the application, including complete schedules of:</para.text>
</para>
<list list.style="para">
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|28|31:28">
<para.text>Bonds and notes owned.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|28|31:28">
<para.text>Corporate stocks owned.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(c)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|28|31:28">
<para.text>Mortgage loans owned.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(d)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|28|31:28">
<para.text>Other investments.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(e)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|28|31:28">
<para.text>Depreciable and depletable assets owned.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(f)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|28|31:28">
<para.text>Other assets.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(g)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|28|31:28">
<para.text>Mortgages and notes payable.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(h)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|28|31:28">
<para.text>Other liabilities.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
</list>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>5</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|28|31:28">
<para.text>Operating statements for each accounting year the applicant has been in existence for up to four years before the application, including complete schedules of:</para.text>
</para>
<list list.style="para">
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|28|31:28">
<para.text>Gross amounts received from any sales of assets, excluding inventory items.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|28|31:28">
<para.text>Contributions, gifts, grants, and other similar amounts paid out.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(c)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|28|31:28">
<para.text>Disbursements to or for the benefit of members.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(d)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|28|31:28">
<para.text>Compensation of officers, directors, and trustees, if any.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(e)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|28|31:28">
<para.text>Miscellaneous expenditures.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
</list>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>6</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|28|31:28">
<para.text>Detailed statements as to the actual or the proposed activities of the applicant.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>7</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|28|31:28">
<para.text>Power of attorney specifically authorizing any one or more agents or attorneys to represent the applicant before the Treasury Department in person or by correspondence (Form 2848).</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>8</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|28|31:28">
<para.text>Statement of reasons why the applicant requests that any information be withheld from public inspection.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
</list>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|28|31:28">
<para.text>
See I.R.S. Pub. 557. The application must be on IRS Form 1023 for applicants claiming to be exempt under <st>26 U.S.C.A. &sect;501(c)(3)</st>. Additional information may be required depending on the applicant's proposed activities. Where the application requires a conformed copy, it must agree with the original document and all amendments thereto. If the copies are not signed, they must be accompanied by a written declaration signed by an officer authorized to sign for the organization, certifying that they are complete and accurate copies of the original documents. See <st>Rev. Proc. 68-14, 1968-1 C.B. 768</st> and the Instructions for IRS Form 1023.
</para.text>
</para>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|28|31:28">
<para.text>
If the application does not contain the required information, it may be returned with a letter of explanation without being considered on its merits. If the completed application is resubmitted within the time period indicated in the letter from the IRS, it will be considered received on the original submission date. In that case, if the original submission was timely, the application will be considered timely filed.
</para.text>
</para>
<item.reference.block>
<item.reference>
<name.block>
<label>Item</label>
<designator>6.</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|28|31:28">
<para.text>
See <st>26 C.F.R. &sect;1.501(c)(3)-1(b)(1)(v)</st>.
</para.text>
</para>
</item.reference>
<item.reference>
<name.block>
<label>Item</label>
<designator>8.</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|28|31:28">
<para.text>
Any information submitted in the application or in support of it that relates to any trade secret, patent, process, style of work, or apparatus, upon request, may be withheld from public inspection if the Commissioner determines that the disclosure of such information would adversely affect the organization. The request must:
</para.text>
</para>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|28|31:28">
<para.text>
1. Identify the material to be withheld (the document, page, paragraph, and line) by clearly marking it, “NOT SUBJECT TO PUBLIC INSPECTION.”
</para.text>
</para>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|28|31:28">
<para.text>
2. Include the reasons for your organization's position that the information is of the type that may be withheld from public inspection.
</para.text>
</para>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|28|31:28">
<para.text>
3. Be filed with the documents in which the material to be withheld is contained.
</para.text>
</para>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><tk>West's Key Number Digest, Charities &key;42</tk></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry><ref.text>Disclosure requirements, <rc>Federal Tax Guide to Legal Forms &sect;10:58</rc></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</item.reference>
</item.reference.block>
</check.list>
</section.body>
</section>
<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block>
<label>&sect;</label>
<designator>31:29</designator>
<name>Checklist<sep/> Procedure to apply for determination letter of exempt status</name>
</outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>CHK</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<check.list>
<list list.style="para">
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>1</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Obtain employer identification number (EIN).</para.text>
</para>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>If not previously applied for, prepare Form SS-4.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>3</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Determine appropriate exemption classification for organization being formed.</para.text>
</para>
<list list.style="para">
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Includes determination whether submission is required and, if not, whether it should nevertheless be made.</para.text>
</para>
<list list.style="para">
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>1</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Usual advice as to obtaining determination letter.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>2</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Submission not required for churches, publicly supported organizations with revenues of less than $5000, and subordinate organizations covered by a parent's exemption.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
</list>
</list.item>
</list>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>4</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Obtain appropriate form for application.</para.text>
</para>
<list list.style="para">
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Form 1023 is for most Section 501(c)(3) organizations.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Form 1024 is for Section 501(a) organizations.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(c)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Most, but not all, organizations come under the above forms. If not covered by one of these, application is by letter.</para.text>
</para>
<list list.style="para">
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>1</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Letter should follow general format of Forms 1023 and 1024 and include the same enclosures.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
</list>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(d)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Study questions on application, including schedule applying to organization.</para.text>
</para>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Determine what information is not currently available and means of obtaining it.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(e)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Gather all tax returns previously filed by organization, including information returns.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
</list>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>5</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Prepare financial material.</para.text>
</para>
<list list.style="para">
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Gather financial statements for last three full years of organization's existence.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Prepare financial statement for current year to within 60 days of application filing date.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(c)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Determine whether financial information is sufficient to complete financial data section of form for last three years and current year.</para.text>
</para>
<list list.style="para">
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>1</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>If not, determine how the information may be obtained.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>2</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>In general, receipts and expenditures must be shown, including the sources of receipts and the nature of expenditures. A distinction must be drawn between expenditures for exempt purposes and expenditures for administration.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>3</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Break-down of revenue sources is required.</para.text>
</para>
<list list.style="para">
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(A)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Public or private sources.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(B)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Contributions, grants, or other sources.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(C)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Fundraising events, ticket sales, rentals, other business or investment sources.</para.text>
</para>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Full explanation of the activities must be given.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(I)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Need for this depends on individual forms.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
</list>
</list.item>
</list>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(d)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>If operations have not begun or have been conducted for less than a year prepare proposed budget for two full accounting periods and a current statement of assets and liabilities.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
</list>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>6</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Prepare a description of the activities of the organization, past, present and planned.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>7</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Prepare a description of the fundraising program, actual and planned, and the method for effectuating it.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>8</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Prepare a description of the criteria used for selecting recipients of funds or benefits.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>9</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Obtain conformed copy of articles of incorporation, articles of association, or other foundation document for the organization.</para.text>
</para>
<list list.style="para">
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>An enabling document is a requisite for determination of exemption.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>If organization is incorporated, approval by the appropriate state official must be included.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
</list>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>10</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Obtain conformed copy of bylaws.</para.text>
</para>
<list list.style="para">
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Study instructions and complete forms.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Obtain check or money order for payment of fee.</para.text>
</para>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Money order is recommended as action is delayed until a check clears.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
</list>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>12</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Complete all forms and prepare package of material for submission. Include:</para.text>
</para>
<list list.style="para">
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Application form (usually Form 1023 or 1024).</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Form 8718.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(c)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Form 2848, if applicable.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(d)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Fee.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(e)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Organizing documents, such as articles of incorporation.</para.text>
</para>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Include approval by state official if incorporated.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(f)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Bylaws.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(g)</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Every attachment must show name and EIN of organization, identification as an attachment to the application form and identification of the part and line item number to which it applies.</para.text>
</para>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Organizing documents and bylaws must also be conformed with sworn statement of an officer or director as to the truth and correctness of documents.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
</list>
</list.item>
<list.item>
<name.block>
<designator>13</designator>
</name.block>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|29|31:29">
<para.text>Submit application to IRS office designated in Form 8718.</para.text>
</para>
</list.item>
</list>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><tk>West's Key Number Digest, Internal Revenue &key;4045 to 4079</tk></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>

<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block>
<label>&sect;</label>
<designator>31:30</designator>
<name>Minutes of incorporators' organizational meeting</name>
</outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Ic7036190181b11e68c12afa7f3a24041">
<form.name.block>
<name>MINUTES OF THE FIRST MEETING OF INCORPORATORS OF <inline.instr>__lsqb__NAME OF CORPORATION__rsqb__</inline.instr></name>
</form.name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|31|31:30">
<form.text>
On <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__date of meeting__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>, at <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__time of meeting__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>, at <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__place of meeting__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>, <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>, <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of county__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>, <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>, a meeting of the following-named persons was held: <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__names of incorporators__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>.
</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|31|31:30">
<form.text>
The meeting was called to order by <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of presiding officer__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>, who presided over the elections of officers of the meeting. By motion duly made, seconded, and carried, <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of chairperson__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> was elected chair of the meeting and <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of secretary__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> was elected Secretary.
</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|31|31:30">
<form.text>
 <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of chairperson__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> then announced that the object of the meeting was to take such steps as might be necessary to organize a not-for-profit charitable corporation under the <st>Not-for-Profit Corporation Law of the State of New York</st>, to be known as <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of corporation__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>, which would qualify for income tax exemption under <st>Section 501(c)(3) of the Federal Internal Revenue Code</st>.
</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|31|31:30">
<form.text>
<inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of chairperson__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> presented a draft of the certificate of incorporation of <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of corporation__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>. The draft was then unanimously approved by the proposed incorporators, <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__names of incorporators__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>, all of whom signed the same in the manner required by law. A copy of the certificate of incorporation so presented and approved is attached.
</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|31|31:30">
<form.text>
By motion duly made, seconded, and unanimously carried, the Secretary was directed to follow the statutory procedure for obtaining the approval of the Supreme Court of the <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__identification of judicial district__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> of the above certificate and, upon obtaining such approval, to file the certificate of incorporation in the office of the Secretary of State of the State of New York.
</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|31|31:30">
<form.text>
There being no further business to come before the meeting, upon motion duly made, seconded, and unanimously carried, the meeting was adjourned.
</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.line align="l">
<inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr>
</form.line>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y">
<inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of authorized representative&rsqb;</inline.instr>
</form.line>
<form.line align="l">
<inline.instr>&lsqb;Title of authorized representative &rsqb;</inline.instr>
</form.line>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y">
<inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of secretary&rsqb;</inline.instr>
</form.line>
<form.line align="l">
<inline.instr>&lsqb;date of meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>
</form.line>
</signature.group>
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y">
</form.line>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y">
<inline.instr>&lsqb;Names of directors&rsqb;</inline.instr>
</form.line>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|31|31:30">
<para.text>
Although the corporation does not come into existence until the certificate is filed by the Department of State (see <st>N-PCL &sect;403</st>), the incorporators may take preliminary steps to organize the corporation. See <x>&dblsect;17:1 et seq.</x>
</para.text>
</para>
</note.group>

</section>

</outline.name.block>

<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Ic70388a0181b11e68c12afa7f3a24041">
<form.name.block>
<name>CONSENT TO ACTION TAKEN IN LIEU OF THE ORGANIZATION MEETING OF <inline.instr>__lsqb__NAME OF CORPORATION__rsqb__</inline.instr></name>
</form.name.block>
<form.line align="l">
</form.line>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|32|31:31">
<form.text>
The undersigned, being the President of the Corporation, hereby consents to the action taken, as hereafter stated, in lieu of the organization meeting:
</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|32|31:31">
<form.text>
A copy of the certificate of incorporation together with the receipt issued by the Department of State showing the date and payment of the filing fee for the original certificate of incorporation was appended to this statement.
</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|32|31:31">
<form.text>
By<trace>l</trace>aws regulating the conduct and the affairs of the corporation, as prepared by <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of law firm__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>, attorneys for the corporation, were adopted and ordered appended thereto.
</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|32|31:31">
<form.text>
The following persons were appointed directors of the corporation: <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__names of directors__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>.
</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|32|31:31">
<form.text>
The principal office of the corporation was fixed at <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__address of office__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>, <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>, New York <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__specification of ZIP code__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>.
</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|32|31:31">
<form.text>
<inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of depository__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>, located at <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__address of depository__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>, <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>, New York <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__specification of ZIP code__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>, was designated as depository for bank accounts in the name of the corporation, with <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__titles of officers__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> as authorized signatories.
</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.line align="l">
</form.line>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l">
Dated:
<inline.instr>&lsqb;date of consent&rsqb;</inline.instr>
</form.line>
</signature.group>

<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y">
<inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of president&rsqb;</inline.instr>
