</research.reference.block>
</note.block>
</form>
</section.body>
</section>
<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block>
<label>&sect;</label>
<designator>31:81</designator>
<name>Charitable foundation trust agreement<sep/> Payments directed by committee</name>
</outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EPP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TAO</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Ic70ed340181b11e68c12afa7f3a24041">
<form.para>
<form.text>This Agreement made as of <inline.instr>__lsqb__date of agreement__rsqb__</inline.instr> by and between <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of settlor__rsqb__</inline.instr>, party of the first part (hereafter referred to as the “Settlor”), and <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of trustee__rsqb__</inline.instr>, party of the second part (hereinafter referred to as the “Trustee”).</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.para>
<form.text>WITNESSETH:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>WHEREAS, the Settlor intends to hereby create and establish a charitable trust for the exclusive purposes hereinafter set forth; and</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>WHEREAS, the Settlor intends to hereby provide that such charitable trust shall always exist and be operated for the exclusive purposes hereinafter set forth; and</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>WHEREAS, the Settlor intends to provide hereby that all donations to and all income of such charitable trust shall always be received, held, administered, and (to the extent applicable) distributed for the exclusive purposes hereinafter set forth;</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>NOW, THEREFORE, for the purpose of carrying out and giving effect to the above-stated intentions of the Settlor and also for the purpose of prescribing the terms and conditions upon which all donations to and all income of the charitable trust are to be held and administered and distributed for the exclusive purposes for which the charitable trust is created and for which the charitable trust is to be operated, and also for the purpose of defining the powers and duties of the Trustee, and also for such other purposes as may be required by law, the Settlor and the Trustee do hereby covenant and agree as follows:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<head>
<name.block>
<label>ARTICLE</label>
<designator>I</designator>
<name>CREATION OF THE TRUST</name>
</name.block>
</head>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>The Settlor hereby creates and establishes a charitable trust (hereinafter referred to as the “Trust”) for the exclusive purposes hereinafter set forth, and the Trustee hereby accepts the Trust and agrees to act as Trustee of and under the Trust in accordance with the terms and conditions hereinafter set forth.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<head>
<name.block>
<label>ARTICLE</label>
<designator>II</designator>
<name>NAME OF THE TRUST</name>
</name.block>
</head>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>The Trust hereby created and established shall be known and designated as <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of foundation__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<head>
<name.block>
<label>ARTICLE</label>
<designator>III</designator>
<name>THE COMMITTEE</name>
</name.block>
</head>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>It is the intent of the Settlor to provide herein for a self-perpetuating Committee, which shall consist at all times of not less than <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of individuals__rsqb__</inline.instr> individuals.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>The original members of the Committee shall be <inline.instr>__lsqb__names of original members__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>At any time and times during his or her lifetime, the Settlor shall have the right, without the consent of the other then members of the Committee: (1) to appoint a new member in addition to the other then members of the Committee; (2) to appoint a new member to fill any vacancy in the Committee; and (3) to discharge any member of the Committee.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>At any time and times, a majority of the then members of the Committee shall have the right: (1) to appoint a new member in addition to the other then members of the Committee; (2) to appoint a new member to fill any vacancy in the Committee; and (3) to discharge any member of the Committee. However, the Settlor must consent to any such appointment or discharge made during the lifetime of the Settlor.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>Regardless of the existence of any vacancy, the Committee may act as long as there shall be in office at least <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of members__rsqb__</inline.instr> members. If, at any time and for any reason or no reason, the Committee consists of less than <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of members__rsqb__</inline.instr> members for a period of <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of days__rsqb__</inline.instr> days, the Trustee shall appoint a new member or members to fill the vacancy or vacancies so that the Committee shall consist of <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of members__rsqb__</inline.instr> members, and such appointment or appointments by the Trustee may be made without the consent of either the Settlor or any other then member of the Committee, provided that the Trustee shall give the Settlor at least 45-days prior written notice of the intention to fill any vacancy among the Committee hereunder so as to enable the Settlor to make an appointment or appointments to raise the number of members of the Committee to <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of members__rsqb__</inline.instr> members. Upon the Settlor's appointment of new members pursuant to the preceding sentence, the Trustee's power to fill any vacancy prior to its notice to Settlor shall cease with respect to the vacancies existing prior to such written notice by the Trustee. The Trustee shall not make any appointments of new members during the Settlor's lifetime prior to the expiration of the 45-day period contemplated by the preceding sentence.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>If a member of the Committee is discharged under the prior provisions of this ARTICLE III, he or she shall not be entitled to ask for or receive any reason for his or her discharge or any prior notice of his or her discharge.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>The Committee shall have the specific powers hereinafter granted and shall also have all other powers necessary or advisable to carry out the functions contemplated for the Committee hereunder in discharging the purposes of the Trust.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>On all matters and questions, a decision of the majority of the then members of the Committee shall govern and control, except as otherwise expressly provided herein to the contrary.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>If any written instrument is required to be signed or if any action is required to be taken by or on behalf of the Committee, such written instrument may be signed and such action may be taken on behalf of the Committee by any person or persons authorized by all members of the Committee to sign such written instrument or to take such action on its behalf. Any such authorized person need not be a member of the Committee.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>No bond or other security shall be required of any member of the Committee. No fee or other compensation shall be paid to any member of the Committee for his or her services as such member.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>The Committee may use the name of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of foundation committee__rsqb__</inline.instr> or any other name which the Committee may elect to use at any time or times.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<head>
<name.block>
<label>ARTICLE</label>
<designator>IV</designator>
<name>DONATIONS TO THE TRUST</name>
</name.block>
</head>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>Donations to the Trust may be made by the Settlor. Without undertaking any legal obligation thereby, it is the expressed intention of the Settlor to make such donations from time to time.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>Donations to the Trust may also be made by any person or party other than the Settlor, but expressly subject to the condition that the Trustee may refuse to accept as a donation from the Settlor or from any such other person or party any item of property of a type which the Trustee, in its sole and uncontrolled discretion, deems inadvisable or improper to accept.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>Each donation to the Trust shall be made by paying or transferring or otherwise delivering to the Trustee the item or items of property representing such donation.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>Any donation to the Trust may be in the form of cash, in the form of any type of check or any type of other instrument for the payment of money, or in the form of any type of security or other property.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<head>
<name.block>
<label>ARTICLE</label>
<designator>V</designator>
<name>THE TRUST FUND</name>
</name.block>
</head>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>Subject to the right of refusal conferred by ARTICLE IV, the Trustee shall receive each donation paid or transferred or otherwise delivered to the Trustee by the Settlor and by any person or party other than the Settlor.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>All such donations so received by the Trustee, together with all income therefrom and thereon, is hereinafter referred to as the “Trust Fund.”</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>The Trustee shall receive, hold, manage, and administer the Trust Fund for the exclusive purposes hereinafter set forth and in accordance with the terms and conditions hereinafter prescribed.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<head>
<name.block>
<label>ARTICLE</label>
<designator>VI</designator>
<name>EXCLUSIVE PURPOSES OF TRUST AND TRUST FUND</name>
</name.block>
</head>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>The Trust is created and shall exist and shall be operated exclusively for religious, charitable, scientific, literary, or educational purposes or for the prevention of cruelty to children or animals within the United States of America, and no part of the net earnings or principal of the Trust shall inure to the benefit of any contributor (including the Settlor) to the Trust Fund, member of the Committee or Trustee except that the Trustee shall be entitled to reasonable compensation as such; in addition, no part of the activities of the Trust shall consist of carrying on propaganda or otherwise attempting to influence legislation.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>The Trust Fund (other than such part as may be required to pay taxes and administration expenses) shall exist and shall be held, administered, and distributed exclusively for religious, charitable, scientific, literary, or educational purposes or for the prevention of cruelty to children or animals within the United States of America, and no part of the net earnings of the Trust Fund shall inure to the benefit of any contributor (including the Settlor) to the Trust Fund, member of the Committee or Trustee except that the Trustee shall be entitled to reasonable compensation as such, and no part of the activities of the Trust Fund shall consist of carrying on propaganda or otherwise attempting to influence legislation.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>It is the expressed intention of the Settlor that at all times the Trust and the Trust Fund shall be tax exempt and that at all times all donations to the Trust and Trust Fund shall be deductible from the taxable income of the donating party to the extent allowed by law.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>Neither the Trustee nor the Committee shall have any power or authority to take or omit any action or proceeding that would: (a) deprive the Trust or Trust Fund of tax exemption or otherwise constitute a prohibited transaction under the provisions of the <st>Internal Revenue Code of 1986</st>; (b) attract any excise tax under the <st>Internal Revenue Code of 1986</st> (other than under <st>Section 4940</st>); or (c) result in any tax under <st>Section 507 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986</st>. All reference to the <st>Internal Revenue Code of 1986</st> or any section thereof shall be to such Code or section, as amended from time to time, or to corresponding internal revenue laws of the United States or corresponding provisions thereof.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<head>
<name.block>
<label>ARTICLE</label>
<designator>VII</designator>
<name>PAYMENTS FROM THE TRUST FUND</name>
</name.block>
</head>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>Except only as hereinafter expressly provided to the contrary, the Trustee shall make payments of and from the Trust Fund only upon and in accordance with the written directions of the Committee and only in such manner and at such times and in such amounts and to such persons or parties as may be specified in such written directions of the Committee, which directions shall comply with all the requirements of ARTICLE VII of this Agreement.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<head>
<name.block>
<label>ARTICLE</label>
<designator>VIII</designator>
<name>ADMINISTRATIVE POWERS</name>
</name.block>
</head>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>The Trustee shall have the following powers and authorities in the administration of the Trust Fund, to wit:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(1)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>To invest and reinvest the Trust Fund by way of purchase or subscription or exchange or otherwise in any securities or other property and to retain in the Trust Fund any securities or other property, without regard to the proportion that any one item or any one type of such securities or other property may bear to the total principal of the Trust Fund at any time, subject, however, always to the directions of ARTICLE VI of this Agreement.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(2)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>To sell for cash or on credit, convert, redeem, exchange, or otherwise dispose of any securities or other property at any time held by the Trustee.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(3)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>To exercise any conversion privilege and/or subscription right available in connection with any securities or other property held by it at any time.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(4)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>To consent to the reorganization, consolidation, merger, or readjustment of the finances of any corporation, company, or association any of the securities of which may be held by it; to consent to the sale, mortgage, pledge, or lease of the property of any corporation, company, or association any of the securities of which may be held by it; to do any act with reference to or in connection with any of the foregoing that it may deem to be necessary or advisable, including the exercise of options, the making of agreements or subscriptions, and the holding and retaining of any securities or other property that it may acquire as a result of any of the foregoing.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(5)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>To settle, compromise, or submit to arbitration any claims, debts, or damages due and owing to or from the Trust Fund and to commence or defend suits or legal proceedings and to represent the Trust in all suits and legal proceedings.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(6)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>To vote personally or by general or limited proxy any securities or other property held by it at any time and to exercise, personally or by general or limited power of attorney, any right appurtenant to any securities or other property held by it at any time.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(7)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>To keep in cash at any time and times any part or all of the Trust Fund without payment of any interest thereon.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(8)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>To employ suitable agents and counsel and to pay their reasonable expenses and compensation from the Trust Fund.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(9)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>To register any securities or other property held by it at any time in its own name or in the name of a nominee with or without the addition of words, indicating that such securities or other property are held in a fiduciary capacity except as may otherwise be required by law, and to hold in bearer form any securities or other property held by it at any time so that the same will pass by delivery.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(10)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>To make and execute and deliver, as Trustee, any and all instruments in writing necessary or proper for the accomplishment of any of the foregoing powers.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<head>
<name.block>
<label>ARTICLE</label>
<designator>IX</designator>
<name>DEFINITION OF SECURITIES OR OTHER PROPERTY</name>
</name.block>
</head>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>Wherever used in this Agreement, the words “securities or other property” are hereby defined to mean and refer to all types or classes of any real property, personal property, common stocks, preferred stocks, capital stocks, notes, bonds, debentures, mortgages, evidences of indebtedness, evidences of ownership, life insurance policies, endowment policies, and annuity policies, regardless of whether or not any of the same are of the character authorized as legal investments for a Trustee under any laws applicable to the Trust or Trust Fund or the Trustee.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<head>
<name.block>
<label>ARTICLE</label>
<designator>X</designator>
<name>ACCOUNTINGS OF TRUSTEE</name>
</name.block>
</head>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>From time to time, the Trustee shall render accounts of its transactions to the Committee, but the Trustee shall not be required to account more than once a year. The Committee may approve such accounts by an instrument in writing delivered to the Trustee. In the absence of the filing in writing with the Trustee by the Committee of exceptions or objections to any such account within <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of days__rsqb__</inline.instr> days after the date the same was rendered, the Committee shall be deemed to have approved such account. Upon the approval of any such account by the Committee, whether such approval be in writing or as set forth in the next preceding sentence, the Trustee shall be released and relieved and discharged with respect to all matters and things set forth in such account with the same force and effect as though such account had been settled by the decree of a court of competent jurisdiction. Except as otherwise provided by law, no person or party other than the Committee may require any such accounting by the Trustee.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>The Trustee may initiate at any time any action or proceedings for the settlement of its accounts or for the determination of any question of construction that may arise. In such event, except as otherwise provided by law, the only necessary parties to any such action or proceedings shall be the Committee, except that the Trustee, if it so elects, may name as parties any other person, party, or governmental authority.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<head>
<name.block>
<label>ARTICLE</label>
<designator>XI</designator>
<name>TRUST AND TRUST FUND IRREVOCABLE</name>
</name.block>
</head>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>This agreement and the Trust and the Trust Fund shall be and shall remain irrevocable, and the Settlor shall not have the right at any time to revoke this Agreement or the Trust Fund.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<head>
<name.block>
<label>ARTICLE</label>
<designator>XII</designator>
<name>AMENDMENTS TO TRUST</name>
</name.block>
</head>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>This Agreement may be amended at any time and times only: (a) by the Settlor during his or her lifetime; and (b) by the Committee after the death of the Settlor. However, no such amendment shall permit any part of the Trust Fund to be held or administered or distributed for any purposes other than the exclusive purposes set forth in ARTICLE VI hereof, and no such amendment shall effect or result in a revocation or termination of this Agreement or of the Trust, the Trust Fund, or any part thereof.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>An amendment shall be by a written instrument delivered to the Trustee and signed by the Settlor during his or her lifetime or by the survivor of him or her during his or her lifetime or by the Committee after the death of the Settlor. The signature of the Trustee shall not be required unless the amendment increases its duties or obligations or changes its compensation.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<head>
<name.block>
<label>ARTICLE</label>
<designator>XIII</designator>
<name>GOVERNING LAW</name>
</name.block>
</head>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>This Agreement and the Trust and Trust Fund shall be construed, regulated, and administered under the laws of the State of New York. All donations to the Trust shall be deemed to take place in the State of New York. The Trustee shall be liable to account only in the courts of the State of New York.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<head>
<name.block>
<label>ARTICLE</label>
<designator>XIV</designator>
<name>ADDITIONAL AND SUCCESSOR TRUSTEES</name>
</name.block>
</head>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>At any time and times, the Committee may appoint one or more individuals or corporation to act as Trustee or Trustees hereunder with and in addition to the then acting Trustee or Trustees, provided, however, that only one bank or trust company shall be acting as corporate Trustee hereunder at any one time.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>At any time and times, any Trustee then acting hereunder may resign or may be removed by the Committee, and any individual acting as Trustee hereunder shall automatically cease to be a Trustee upon the event of his or her death. If the resigning or removed or deceased Trustee is the sole Trustee then acting hereunder, the Committee is directed to appoint one or more individuals and/or corporations to act as successor Trustee or Trustees hereunder.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>Any Trustee who has resigned or who has been removed by the Committee shall transfer and deliver the Trust Fund or any part thereof in its possession to the then remaining Trustee or Trustees or, if none, to its successor Trustee or Trustees.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>There shall at all times be one corporate Trustee acting hereunder.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>The appointment of any additional Trustee or any successor Trustee and the resignation or removal of any Trustee shall be by an instrument in writing satisfactory to both such Trustee and the Committee.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>When more than one Trustee is acting hereunder, all such Trustees shall jointly have the same powers and duties as those conferred upon the original Trustee named in this Agreement, and, on all matters and questions, the decision of a majority of the then Trustees shall govern and control.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>When more than one Trustee is acting hereunder, the words “Trustee” and “Trustees” shall be read and interpreted in the plural so as to refer to all such Trustees.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<head>
<name.block>
<label>ARTICLE</label>
<designator>XV</designator>
<name>TRUSTEE BOND AND COMPENSATION</name>
</name.block>
</head>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>No bond or other security shall be required of any Trustee hereunder, whether original, additional, or successor, for the faithful performance of its or <inline.instr>__lsqb__his/her/their__rsqb__</inline.instr> duties in any jurisdiction.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>Any Corporate Trustee shall be paid such reasonable compensation as shall be agreed upon from time to time by the Committee and the Trustee. Such compensation and all expenses of administration, including counsel fees, shall be paid to and withdrawn by the Trustee from and out of the Trust Fund. No individual Trustee shall be entitled to any compensation as such.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>Subject to the provisions of ARTICLE VI, the Trustee shall charge against and withdraw and pay from the Trust Fund all real and personal property taxes, income taxes, and other taxes of any and all kinds levied or assessed under existing or future laws of the United States of America or any state or jurisdiction thereof upon or in respect to the Trust Fund or any securities or other property forming a part of the Trust Fund.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<head>
<name.block>
<label>ARTICLE</label>
<designator>XVI</designator>
<name>TRUSTEE LIABILITY</name>
</name.block>
</head>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>The Trustee shall not be liable hereunder for any matter or thing, except only for its own negligence or willful misconduct.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>This Agreement shall be executed in <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of original counterparts__rsqb__</inline.instr> counterparts, each one of which shall be deemed to be the original regardless of whether or not the others are produced.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>In Witnesseth Whereof the Settlor has affixed his or her hand and seal on or as of the day and year first above written, and the Trustee has caused these presents to be executed by its duly authorized officer or officers and its corporate seal to be hereunto affixed on or as of the day and year first above written.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>The Trustee shall not be liable hereunder for any matter or thing, except only for its own negligence or willful misconduct.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>This Agreement shall be executed in <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of original counterparts__rsqb__</inline.instr> counterparts, each one of which shall be deemed to be the original regardless of whether or not the others are produced.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<form.text>In Witnesseth Whereof the Settlor has affixed his or her hand and seal on or as of the day and year first above written, and the Trustee has caused these presents to be executed by its duly authorized officer or officers and its corporate seal to be hereunto affixed on or as of the day and year first above written.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>

<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<trace.deleted/>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<para.text>
This agreement will create a private foundation under <st>Section 509 of the Internal Revenue Code</st> with attendant 2% excise tax and reporting requirements resulting in additional administration expenses and restrictions.
</para.text>
</para>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|83|31:81">
<para.text>
The transfer to a private foundation contemplated by this form may also affect the amount of the charitable deduction available to the Settlor: (1) if appreciated property is transferred by any Settlor, whether individual or corporate; or (2) if by an individual, when the maximum amount of the charitable deduction will be lower than in the case of a contribution not made to a private foundation.
</para.text>
</para>
</note.group>

<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block>
<label>&sect;</label>
<designator>31:82</designator>
<name>Restricted endowment to educational, religious, or charitable institution</name>
</outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Ic70efa50181b11e68c12afa7f3a24041">
<form.para>
<form.text>I, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of donor__rsqb__</inline.instr>, residing at <inline.instr>__lsqb__address of donor__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of county__rsqb__</inline.instr>, State of New York, desire and intend to make a gift to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of institution__rsqb__</inline.instr>, of <inline.instr>__lsqb__address of institution__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of county__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr>. To that end, I hereby give to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of institution__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__OPTIONAL: a New York corporation not-for-profit,__rsqb__</inline.instr> the sum of $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of donation__rsqb__</inline.instr>, together with the property described as follows: <inline.instr>__lsqb__description of property__rsqb__</inline.instr>, to be invested, sold, or reinvested, alone or in combination with other funds of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of institution__rsqb__</inline.instr> by the <inline.instr>__lsqb__title of proper officers__rsqb__</inline.instr> as they see fit. Income from this sum is to be used exclusively for <inline.instr>__lsqb__specification of purpose of usage__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|84|31:82">
<form.text>
My personal check made out to the order of <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of institution__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> in the sum of $<inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of check__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> is enclosed in payment of the cash portion of this gift. The balance of the gift, consisting of the above-mentioned property, will be delivered <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__specification of delivery manner__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> on <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__date of delivery__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>.
</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.line align="l">
</form.line>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l">
Dated:
<inline.instr>&lsqb;date of gift&rsqb;</inline.instr>
</form.line>
</signature.group>
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y">
<inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of donor&rsqb;</inline.instr>
</form.line>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|84|31:82">
<para.text>
“Endowment fund” means an institutional fund or part thereof that, under the terms of a gift instrument, is not wholly expendable by the institution on a current basis. The term does not include assets that an institution may designate as an endowment fund for its own use, consistent with the terms of the applicable gift instrument. <st>N-PCL &sect;551(b)</st>.
</para.text>
</para>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|84|31:82">
<para.text>
An institution, in managing and investing an institutional fund, must consider the purposes of the institution and the purposes of the institutional fund. In addition to complying with the duty of loyalty imposed by law other than this article, each person responsible for managing and investing an institutional fund must manage and invest the fund in good faith and with the care an ordinarily prudent person in a like position would exercise under similar circumstances. <st>N-PCL §552(a)</st>. Therefore, while it may be unnecessary for the settlor to include additional language concerning duration of the fund in order to convey an intention that the gift be maintained as a permanent fund, the drafter may find it advisable to review the provisions of <st>Article 5-A of the Not-for-Profit Corporation Law, Prudent Management of Institutional Funds Act</st>. Note that an endowment fund is, by definition, a permanent fund. <cc>In re Huntingdon College, 22 Misc. 3d 1124(A), 880 N.Y.S.2d 224, 2009 N.Y. Slip Op. 50276(U), 2009 WL 416088 (Sur. Ct. 2009)</cc>.
</para.text>
</para>
<trace.deleted/>
</note.group>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><tk>West's Key Number Digest, Charities &key;6</tk></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry><ref.text><tk>West's Key Number Digest, Charities &key;9 to 16</tk></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry><ref.text><rc>N.Y. Jur. 2d, Charities &dblsect;3 et seq</rc>.</ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry date.trace="1"><ref.text><rc>Am. Jur. 2d, Charities &dblsect;3 et seq</rc>.</ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>
</form>
</section.body>
</section>
<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block>
<label>&sect;</label>
<designator>31:83</designator>
<name>Subscription to university</name>
</outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Ic70f4870181b11e68c12afa7f3a24041">
<form.para>
<form.text>I, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of subscriber__rsqb__</inline.instr>, of <inline.instr>__lsqb__address of subscriber__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of county__rsqb__</inline.instr>, State of New York, in consideration of my interest in higher education, shall pay to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of university__rsqb__</inline.instr>, located at <inline.instr>__lsqb__address of university__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of county__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr>, the sum of $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of donation__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|85|31:83">
<form.text>
This subscription is made on the following conditions:
</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.para>
<form.text>1.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|85|31:83">
<form.text>This subscription is to be used only for <inline.instr>__lsqb__specification of purpose__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>2.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|85|31:83">
<form.text>This subscription shall be paid in 12 equal monthly installments, beginning <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of month__rsqb__</inline.instr> <inline.instr>__lsqb__identification of year__rsqb__</inline.instr> and continuing on the first day of each of the following months until fully paid.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|85|31:83">
<form.text>This subscription shall be paid in 12 equal monthly installments, beginning <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of month__rsqb__</inline.instr> <inline.instr>__lsqb__identification of year__rsqb__</inline.instr> and continuing on the first day of each of the following months until fully paid.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.unit>
<form.line align="l">
Dated: <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of subscription&rsqb;</inline.instr>
</form.line>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y">
<inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of subscriber&rsqb;</inline.instr>
</form.line>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>

In consideration of my devotion to the <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of religion__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>, I, <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of donor__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>, of <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__address of donor__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>, <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>, <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of county__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>, State of New York, pledge to pay to <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of church__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>, at <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__address of church__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>, <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>, <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of county__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>, <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>, the sum of $<inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of donation__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> for the year <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__identification of year__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>, to be expended by <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of church__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> in any manner whatsoever it deems fit.

</form.para>

<section.front>
<outline.name.block>
<label>&sect;</label>
<designator>31:89</designator>
<name>Professional fundraiser registration statement<sep/> Official form</name>
</outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EFM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Ic71059e0181b11e68c12afa7f3a24041">
<image.block ct.id="UNKNOWN_CT_ID">
<image ident="I039SOF"/>
<image ident="I03FFQH"/>
<image ident="I01D8X7"/>
<image ident="I01H755"/>
<image ident="I01K9K7"/>
<image ident="I03CMU3"/>
<image ident="I03FOMJ"/>
<image ident="I01EDT7"/>
</image.block>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|93|31:89">
<para.text>
The above form, revised in 2014, is available from the New York State Office of the Attorney General, Charities Bureau, <url>http://www.charitiesnys.com</url>, and is reprinted here for illustrative purposes.
</para.text>
</para>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|93|31:89">
<para.text>
No person may act as a professional fundraiser or fundraising counsel before he or she has registered with the Attorney General or after the expiration or cancellation of such registration or any renewal of the registration. <st>Exec. Law &sect;173(1)</st>.
</para.text>
</para>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|93|31:89">
<para.text>
Applications for registration and re-registration must be in writing, under oath, in the form prescribed by the Attorney General and must be accompanied by an annual fee in the sum of $800. <st>Exec. Law &sect;173(1)</st>.
</para.text>
</para>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|93|31:89">
<para.text>
Registration or re-registration, when effected, shall be for a period of one year, expiring one year from the date of registration or re-registration, and may be renewed upon written application, under penalties for perjury, for additional one-year periods. Applications for registration and re-registration, when filed with the Attorney General, shall become public records of the Attorney General. If there is any material change in the information provided in any application for registration and re-registration, the applicant or registrant is required to notify the Attorney General in writing within 20 days of the change. <st>Exec. Law &sect;173(1)</st>.
</para.text>
</para>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|93|31:89">
<para.text>
For form of annual bond of professional fundraiser, see <x>&sect;31:90</x>.
</para.text>
</para>
</note.group>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><tk>West's Key Number Digest, Licenses &key;11(1)</tk></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>
</form>
</section.body>
</section>
<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block>
<label>&sect;</label>
<designator>31:90</designator>
<name>Annual bond for professional fundraisers<sep/> Official form</name>
</outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EFM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Ic71080f0181b11e68c12afa7f3a24041">
<image.block ct.id="UNKNOWN_CT_ID">
<image ident="I00W5HH"/>
<image ident="I00XTJE"/>
</image.block>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|94|31:90">
<para.text>
The above form, revised in 2010, is available from the New York State Office of the Attorney General, Charities Bureau, <url>http://www.charitiesnys.com</url>, and is reprinted here for illustrative purposes.
</para.text>
</para>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|94|31:90">
<para.text>
A professional fundraiser shall at the time of filing each application for registration or re-registration, file with, and have approved by, the Attorney General a bond. In said bond, the filer shall be the principal obligor, in the sum of $10,000, with one or more sureties whose liability in the aggregate as such sureties will at least equal the said sum. The bond which may be in the form of a rider to a larger blanket liability bond shall run to the Attorney General for the use of the state and to any person who may have a cause of action against the obligor of said bond for any malfeasance or misfeasance in the conduct of such solicitation. <st>Exec. Law &sect;173(1)</st>.
</para.text>
</para>
</note.group>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><tk>West's Key Number Digest, Licenses &key;11(1)</tk></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>
</form>

<outline.name.block>
<label>&sect;</label>
<designator>31:95</designator>
<name>Combined annual financial report<sep/> Official form</name>
</outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EFM</online.view.item>

<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block>
<label>&sect;</label>
<designator>31:96</designator>
<name>Contract to provide management services to charitable organization</name>
</outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>CML</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NUC</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Ic711b970181b11e68c12afa7f3a24041">
<form.para>
<form.text>Whereas <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> is a New York corporation that is experienced in and offers management services to charitable organizations;</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text>
Whereas <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> is a nonprofit <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__association/corporation/[type of entity__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>] and is largely operated by volunteers;
</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text>
Therefore, in consideration of the mutual promises contained in this agreement and other good and valuable consideration, the adequacy and receipt of which are hereby acknowledged, <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> and <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> hereby agree as follows:
</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>1</designator>
<name>Term.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text>This agreement shall be for term of <inline.instr>__lsqb__[number of years__rsqb__</inline.instr> years/<inline.instr>__lsqb__number of months__rsqb__</inline.instr> months] from the date hereof and shall be automatically renewed for successive additional periods of <inline.instr>__lsqb__[number of years__rsqb__</inline.instr> years/<inline.instr>__lsqb__number of months__rsqb__</inline.instr> months] each unless earlier terminated as provided for in this agreement.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>2</designator>
<name>Services to Be Provided.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text>During the term of this agreement, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall manage the affairs of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>, furnishing to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> the specific services, facilities, and personnel set forth in Exhibit <inline.instr>__lsqb__designation of exhibit__rsqb__</inline.instr> to this agreement, as it may be revised by mutual agreement from time to time.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>3</designator>
<name>Fees and Expenses.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> agrees to pay <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> in consideration of the services to be furnished by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr>, set forth in Exhibit <inline.instr>__lsqb__designation of exhibit__rsqb__</inline.instr> attached this agreement, the fees specified in Exhibit <inline.instr>__lsqb__designation of exhibit__rsqb__</inline.instr> attached to this agreement, as it may be revised by mutual agreement from time to time. <inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> agrees to pay monthly fees due to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> on or before the first of every month. Costs and expenses incurred by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> on behalf of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall be promptly reimbursed to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>. Fee or expense reimbursement amounts not paid by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> when due pursuant to this agreement shall accrue interest at a per annum rate of over the prime rate of interest as provided in the <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of reporting source__rsqb__</inline.instr>, or the maximum amount of interest allowable by law, whichever is less, from the due date until the date of payment.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>4</designator>
<name>Charity's Responsibilities.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> will be responsible for directing the activities of its Board and its committees and insuring that they made agreed-upon deadlines, travel and meeting commitments, and specific duties. The signature of the President of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> is required for all legal documents such as bank cards, tax forms, and hotel contracts. <inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> will be responsible for payment of the management fee and all reasonable, direct, out-of-pocket (line-item) expenses, such as telephone, postage, printing, typesetting, mailing labor, travel, or other outside services related to day-to-day operation of the enterprise.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text>Any problems that arise between a <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> member, exhibitor, speaker, or any other individual regarding an issue that is not easily resolved should be referred to the President of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>, who will mediate or refer to the proper Board member of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> for action.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>5</designator>
<name>Independent Contractor.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text>In carrying out its responsibilities under this agreement, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall at all times be an independent contractor. Nothing contained in this agreement shall be construed to create an employer&ndash;-employee relationship, a partnership, or joint venture between <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> and <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>6</designator>
<name>Indemnification.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall indemnify, defend, and hold <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> harmless against all claims, damages, suits, causes of action, judgments, and liabilities (and against all associated costs and expenses, including, without limitation, reasonable attorney's fees), arising from <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr>'s proper performance of its obligations under this agreement.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>7</designator>
<name>Termination.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text>This agreement may be terminated at any time by either party without cause, provided that written notice of termination given a specified in this agreement shall be delivered to the other party at least <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of days__rsqb__</inline.instr> days before the intended termination date.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>8</designator>
<name>Employment of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> Personnel.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> agrees that it will not, during the term of this agreement, and for <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of months__rsqb__</inline.instr> months after termination of this agreement, for any reason hire any person who had at any time during the <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of months__rsqb__</inline.instr>-months preceding the date of intended employment by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> been an employee of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> without the prior written approval of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr>. <inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> acknowledges that it is impossible for <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> to calculate at this time the damages <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> will suffer in the event of a breach of this paragraph by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>. Accordingly, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> and <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> agree that if <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> breaches this paragraph of the agreement, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> agrees to pay as liquidated damages to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> an amount equal to <inline.instr>__lsqb__percentage of annual salary__rsqb__</inline.instr>% of the annual salary paid by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> to the employee or employees of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> hired by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> in breach of this agreement during the <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of months__rsqb__</inline.instr> months immediately preceding the date the employee or employees are hired by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>. <inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> agrees that such amount is reasonable compensation to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> for <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>'s breach of this paragraph of the agreement. Such liquidated damages are to be paid to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> no later than the date on which the employment of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr>'s former employee or employees commences with <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>9</designator>
<name>Client Files.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text>All documents and files created by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> for <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall be the property of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>. Upon Termination of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr>'s services under this agreement, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> will return all of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>'s files and documents to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> at a location specified by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>. <inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall not be required to return <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>'s files and documents after termination of this agreement until all of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>'s financial obligations to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> under this agreement have been satisfied.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>10</designator>
<name>Notices.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text>Any notice required to be given under this agreement by either party to the other shall be sufficient if addressed and mailed, certified mail, postage prepaid, to the President of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> at his or her business address with copies to the members of the executive committee of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>. Any notice required to be given under this agreement to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall be sufficient if mailed by certified mail, postage prepaid, to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of authorized person__rsqb__</inline.instr> and <inline.instr>__lsqb__address of authorized person__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of county__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>11</designator>
<name>Applicable Law.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text>This agreement shall be governed by and construed in accord with the laws of the State of New York as if entered into and to be put fully performed in the State of New York.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>12</designator>
<name>Entire Agreement.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text>This agreement sets forth the entire agreement and understanding between the parties on the subject matter of disagreement and supersedes all prior discussions and negotiations between the parties. Neither party shall be bound by any conditions, definitions, representations, or warranties with respect to subject matter of this agreement other than those as expressly provided herein.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>13</designator>
<name>Amendment and Waiver.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text>No modification of this agreement shall be binding unless made in writing and executed by both parties. No waiver by either party of any breach or obligation of the other party under this agreement shall constitute a waiver of any other prior or subsequent breach or obligation.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>14</designator>
<name>Severability.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text>If any provision of this agreement is held by a court of competent jurisdiction to be contrary to law, the remaining provisions in this agreement shall remain in full force and effect.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>15</designator>
<name>Arbitration.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text>Any differences, controversies, or claims arising out of, or relating to this agreement or the breach thereof, shall be settled by arbitration in accordance with the Commercial Arbitration Rules of the American Arbitration Association. The determination of the arbitrators will be accepted and binding upon both parties and a judgment upon the award of the arbitrators may be entered in any court having jurisdiction thereof. <inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> and <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall each select one arbitrator, which two arbitrators shall issue a final, binding decision. The parties shall share equally the costs of such arbitration.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text>In witness whereof, the parties have executed this agreement by their duly authorized representatives as of the date first written above.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text>Any differences, controversies, or claims arising out of, or relating to this agreement or the breach thereof, shall be settled by arbitration in accordance with the Commercial Arbitration Rules of the American Arbitration Association. The determination of the arbitrators will be accepted and binding upon both parties and a judgment upon the award of the arbitrators may be entered in any court having jurisdiction thereof. <inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> and <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall each select one arbitrator, which two arbitrators shall issue a final, binding decision. The parties shall share equally the costs of such arbitration.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text>In witness whereof, the parties have executed this agreement by their duly authorized representatives as of the date first written above.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
<form.line align="l">

<inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of nonprofit organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>
</form.line>

<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block>
<label>&sect;</label>
<designator>31:97</designator>
<name>Contract to provide management services to charitable organization<sep/> With insurance clause</name>
</outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>CML</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NUC</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Ic7122ea0181b11e68c12afa7f3a24041">
<form.para>
<form.text>This is an agreement between <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr>, a corporation chartered in New York, to provide management and administrative services to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>, a nonprofit <inline.instr>__lsqb__association/corporation/[specification of entity__rsqb__</inline.instr>].</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>1</designator>
<name>SERVICES</name>
</name.block>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>A</designator>
<name>Routine Services.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall provide to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> the management and administrative services outlined in Attachment A for the duration of this agreement and any extensions thereof.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>B</designator>
<name>Special Project Services.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> may provide management and administrative services to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> for special projects that are not otherwise included within the scope of this agreement if <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> obtains preauthorization and approval for the provision of such special project services from <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>2</designator>
<name>SCOPE OF SERVICES</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text>The scope of the services to be provided by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> is outlined in Attachment A which is incorporated herein by reference.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>3</designator>
<name>REMUNERATION AND REIMBURSEMENT</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall pay to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> the sum of $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of monthly compensation__rsqb__</inline.instr> a month in compensation for routine services performed or to be performed by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr>. This compensation shall be payable <inline.instr>__lsqb__specification of terms of payment__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall pay to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> for special project services performed or to be performed in accordance with the agreement reached by the parties for the performance of such special project services.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall be promptly reimbursed for all expenses incurred by it in behalf of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>4</designator>
<name>PERSONNEL</name>
</name.block>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>A</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> will assign such support staff as it deems necessary to manage the day-to-day activities of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>. All personnel assigned to provide services to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> will be employed by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> and <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> assumes responsibility for their compensation and terms of employment. Employees of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> are not considered employees of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> within purview of Social Security accounts, workers' compensation laws, or in any other regard. All employees are bonded and will be bonded during the entire term of this contract and any extension thereof.</form.text>
</form.para>

In the event of such a breach or default, the defaulting party must be provided written notice of the breach or default and given a reasonable period to be agreed upon by both parties, not to exceed <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of days__rsqb__</inline.instr> days, in which to cure the same. In performing this service and duty, the Management Firm shall, within the amounts authorized by the Organization's annual budget, retain accounting and legal services necessary to assure such compliance. The tax-related duties and services of the Management Firm shall include, but not be limited to, filing all required returns or other documents and paying all taxes in a timely manner.</form.text>

<name.block>
<designator>5</designator>
<name>MEMBERSHIP SUPPORT DUTIES AND SERVICES</name>
</name.block>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>a</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text>Maintaining membership records and data recording the Organization's retention rate and percentage of new members.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>b</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">

</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>c</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text>Assisting the Organization in programs for the recruitment of new members, including publicizing the ability to make a membership application online via the Organization's Web site.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>d</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">

</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>e</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text>Processing new memberships and renewal memberships and payment of membership dues.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>f</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">

</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>g</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text>Mailing membership cards to new and renewed members annually.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>h</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">

</form.para>

<form.item>

</name.block>

</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>

</section>
<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block>
<label>&sect;</label>
<designator>31:98</designator>
<name>Contract to provide management services to charitable organization<sep/> Provision<sep/> Independent contractor status</name>
</outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EMT</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>AMT</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>CLS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>CML</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NUC</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Ic71255b0181b11e68c12afa7f3a24041">
<form.name.block>
<name>Independent Contractor</name>
</form.name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|102|31:98">
<form.text>
The relationship of <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of service provider__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> to <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of charitable organization__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> will be that of independent contractors and nothing set forth in the agreement will be deemed or construed to render the parties as joint venturers, partners or employer and employee. <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of service provider__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> personnel are neither employees nor agents of <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of charitable organization__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> and are not eligible to participate in any employment benefit plans or other conditions of employment available to <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of charitable organization__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>'s employees. <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of service provider__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> will be solely responsible for making or causing to be made all deductions and withholdings from its personnel's salaries and other compensation if personnel provide services to <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of charitable organization__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>. <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of service provider__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> will have exclusive control over its personnel and over the labor and employee relations, and the policies relating to wages, hours, working conditions or other conditions of its personnel. <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of service provider__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> will have the exclusive right to hire, transfer, suspend, lay off, recall, promote, assign, discipline, discharge and adjust grievances with its personnel. At any time, however, <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of charitable organization__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> will have the right to require <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of service provider__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> to remove from any <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of charitable organization__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> project, initiative, fund raiser or event, any personnel objectionable to <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of charitable organization__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> for any lawful reason.
</form.text>
</form.para>
<note.block>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><tk>West's Key Number Digest, Charities &key;40</tk></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>

<trace.deleted/>

<analytical.level>
<front>
<outline.name.block>
<designator>I</designator>
<name>General Considerations</name>
</outline.name.block>
</front>
<analytical.level.body>
<analytical.level>
<front>
<outline.name.block>
<designator>A.</designator>
<name>Introduction</name>
</outline.name.block>
</front>
<analytical.level.body>
<section.block>
<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block>
<label>&sect;</label>
<designator>31:1</designator>
<name>In general</name>
</outline.name.block>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><tk>West's Key Number Digest, Charities &key;1</tk></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|1|31:1">
<para.text>
Charitable organizations have been exempt from federal income taxation since 1909.
<footnote>
<footnote.reference>1</footnote.reference>
<footnote.body>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|1|31:1">
<para.text>
Payne-Aldrich Tariff Act <st>§38, 36 Stat. 113 (1909)</st>. Now codified as <st>26 U.S.C.A. §501(a)</st>.
</para.text>
</para>
</footnote.body>
</footnote> Contributions to such organizations are generally deductible for purposes of the donor's income, gift, and estate taxes.
<footnote>
<footnote.reference>2</footnote.reference>
<footnote.body>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|1|31:1">
<para.text>
See <x>&sect;31:9</x>.
</para.text>
</para>
</footnote.body>
</footnote> Charitable organizations that qualify for the federal exemption are also exempt from New York's franchise tax and from other state and local taxes.
<footnote>
<footnote.reference>3</footnote.reference>
<footnote.body>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|1|31:1">
<para.text>
See <x>&sect;31:16</x>.
</para.text>
</para>
</footnote.body>
</footnote>
</para.text>
</para>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|1|31:1">
<para.text>
