</table>
</tbl>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|43|31:42">
<form.text>
Further resolved, that the depository is authorized to pay any such instruments so endorsed and presented to it for payment, including those drawn to the individual order of any officer or any other person authorized to sign the instruments; and
</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|43|31:42">
<form.text>
Further resolved, that the authority conferred by these minutes shall remain in full force and effect until written notice of its revocation by the board of directors of this corporation is received by the depository and that the Secretary is authorized and directed to deliver to the depository a certified copy of this resolution and to certify to it the true and correct signatures of the above-named officers.
</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>10</designator>
<name>Application for Tax Exemption.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|43|31:42">
<form.text>The matter of corporate exemption from taxation was then discussed. After discussion, on motion duly approved, the following resolution was adopted:</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>11</designator>
<name>Payment of Organizational Expenses.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|43|31:42">
<form.text>Payment for legal services in the formation and organization of this corporation was next considered. The Secretary read to the meeting a letter from <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of attorney__rsqb__</inline.instr> advising that the fee for <inline.instr>__lsqb__his/her__rsqb__</inline.instr> professional services in the organization and formation of this corporation is $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of legal fees__rsqb__</inline.instr>. After discussion, on motion duly approved, the following resolution was adopted:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|43|31:42">
<form.text>Resolved, that the fair monetary value to this corporation of legal services performed in the formation and organization of the corporation is $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of legal fees__rsqb__</inline.instr> and that the Treasurer is authorized and directed to pay to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of attorney__rsqb__</inline.instr>, by check of this corporation, the above amount.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>12</designator>
<name>Adjournment.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|43|31:42">
<form.text>There being no further business to come before the meeting, on motion duly made, seconded, and unanimously carried, the meeting was declared adjourned.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|43|31:42">
<form.text>There being no further business to come before the meeting, on motion duly made, seconded, and unanimously carried, the meeting was declared adjourned.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
<form.line align="l">
<inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr>
</form.line>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y">
<inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of authorized representative&rsqb;</inline.instr>
</form.line>
<form.line align="l">
<inline.instr>&lsqb;Title of authorized representative&rsqb;</inline.instr>
</form.line>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y">
<inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of secretary&rsqb;</inline.instr>
</form.line>
<form.line align="l">
<inline.instr>&lsqb;Corporate seal&rsqb;</inline.instr>
</form.line>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|43|31:42">
<para.text>
After the certificate of incorporation is filed with the Department of State, a meeting to organize the corporation is held. The meeting is between the initial directors named in the certificate of incorporation or, if none were named, between the incorporators. The meeting need not be held in New York State. At the meeting, the directors or incorporators:
</para.text>
</para>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|43|31:42">
<para.text>
(1) Adopt bylaws.
</para.text>
</para>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|43|31:42">
<para.text>
(2) Elect directors as provided in the certificate of incorporation or bylaws.
</para.text>
</para>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|43|31:42">
<para.text>
(3) Transact such other business as comes before the meeting.
</para.text>
</para>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|43|31:42">
<para.text>
The procedures as to notice of the meeting and as to other procedural aspects of the meeting are specified by statute. <st>N-PCL &sect;405(a).</st>
</para.text>
</para>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|43|31:42">
<para.text>
For other matters that may be considered at the first meeting of the board of directors of a corporation, see <x>&dblsect;17:1 et seq.</x>
</para.text>
</para>
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|43|31:42">
<para.text>
For discussion of formal requirements for incorporating, see <x>§31:5</x>.
</para.text>
</para>
</note.group>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><tk>West's Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3370</tk></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry date.trace="1"><ref.text><rc>N.Y. Jur. 2d, Business Relationships &sect;86</rc></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>
</form>
</section.body>
</section>

<section.front>
<outline.name.block>
<label>&sect;</label>
<designator>31:43</designator>
<name>Minutes of subsequent meeting of board of directors</name>
</outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Ic7066ed0181b11e68c12afa7f3a24041">
<form.para>
<form.text>Minutes of meeting held on <inline.instr>__lsqb__date of meeting__rsqb__</inline.instr> at <inline.instr>__lsqb__location of meeting__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.line align="l">
</form.line>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>
Present: <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__names of directors in attendance__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>
</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>
<inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__OPTIONAL: Guests: [names of nondirectors in attendance__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>]
</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>
NOTE: Reports mentioned below are available from the Secretary and/or the appropriate Committee Chair.
</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.para>
<form.text>1.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>Call to Order.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>The board meeting was called to order at <inline.instr>__lsqb__time of board meeting__rsqb__</inline.instr> by President <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of president__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>2.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>Approval of Minutes of Last Meeting.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>A motion that the minutes of the last meeting be approved was made by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of movant 1__rsqb__</inline.instr> and seconded by <inline.instr>__lsqb__names of movants__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>The motion passed by unanimous vote by all directors in attendance.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>The minutes were approved.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>3.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>Motions and Actions.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>The following motions/actions were read into the record:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>A</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Date of first motion or action__rsqb__</inline.instr></form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of person resigning__rsqb__</inline.instr> resigned from the Board of Directors.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>B</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Date of second motion or action__rsqb__</inline.instr></form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of company__rsqb__</inline.instr> has agreed in principle to the draft agreement calling for them to lease to us their facilities at <inline.instr>__lsqb__address of facilities__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of county__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr>, to enable us to store our archived records.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>C</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Date of third motion or action__rsqb__</inline.instr></form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>MOTION: That the corporation express its gratitude to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of party__rsqb__</inline.instr> for the services <inline.instr>__lsqb__he/she__rsqb__</inline.instr> rendered in expediting our dinner for media representatives.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>Motion passed with all in favor.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>Action: Secretary <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of secretary__rsqb__</inline.instr> will draft a letter expressing our gratitude.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>D</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Date of fourth motion or action__rsqb__</inline.instr></form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>MOTION: That we accept the offer from <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of corporation__rsqb__</inline.instr> to offer our members a <inline.instr>__lsqb__percentage of discount__rsqb__</inline.instr>% discount on their products.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>Motion passed with all in favor.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>Follow-up with <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of corporation__rsqb__</inline.instr> is needed.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>E</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Date of fifth motion or action__rsqb__</inline.instr></form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of secretary__rsqb__</inline.instr>, Secretary, announced the results of the <inline.instr>__lsqb__date of election__rsqb__</inline.instr> election, which were as follows:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of president__rsqb__</inline.instr> was elected as President.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of treasurer__rsqb__</inline.instr> was elected as Treasurer.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of director 1__rsqb__</inline.instr> and <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of director 2__rsqb__</inline.instr> were elected as Directors.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>All officers and directors will take office effective <inline.instr>__lsqb__date of taking office__rsqb__</inline.instr>. <inline.instr>__lsqb__OPTIONAL: [List of terms of office of election__rsqb__</inline.instr>.]</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of officer__rsqb__</inline.instr> submitted <inline.instr>__lsqb__his/her__rsqb__</inline.instr> resignation from the position of <inline.instr>__lsqb__position of officer__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>

</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>See the attached report from committee chair, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of committee__rsqb__</inline.instr>. President, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of president__rsqb__</inline.instr>, raised the issue of past failures to monitor the qualifications of candidates with the necessary thoroughness.</form.text>
</form.para>

</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>C</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>Capital Funding Committee.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>See attached e-mail indicating a negative response to our endeavors to tie cash flow into long-range planning. <inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of movant 1__rsqb__</inline.instr> made the following motion, which was seconded by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of movant 2__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>MOTION: That the Committee explore alternative sources of funding at an acceptable rate of interest after documenting the viability of our long-range plans and their ameliorative effect on cash flow.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>Action: <inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of person__rsqb__</inline.instr> will assist the committee in meeting these objectives.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>The motion passed with all in favor.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>D</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>Web site usage.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>MOTION: That the Board allow state chapters to utilize space on the national Web site for a one-time setup fee of $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of set-up fee__rsqb__</inline.instr> and an additional administrative fee of $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of monthly additional administrative fee__rsqb__</inline.instr> monthly, the latter to be subject to revision as costs change.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>The motion passed unanimously.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>Action: Upon confirmation, the Web site committee will announce the availability of subdirectory space to chapters after resolving administrative details.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>The Board requests that the Committee make a recommendation as to what would ensure more timely updating of information on the Web site. <inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of officer__rsqb__</inline.instr> noted that requests for changes or update action at the Web site should always be sent directly to the webmasters.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>E</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>Tax Designation Committee.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of reporter__rsqb__</inline.instr> reported that the committee had obtained the appropriate forms for applying for Section 501(c)3 status. <inline.instr>__lsqb__He/She__rsqb__</inline.instr> recommended that we get the tax-exempt status sorted out before seeking a new accountant. This could take as long as nine months, <inline.instr>__lsqb__he/she__rsqb__</inline.instr> estimated.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>

</form.para>

</form.para>

</form.para>

</form.para>

</form.para>

</form.para>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>A</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>Bylaws amendment.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of proposer__rsqb__</inline.instr> proposed that the bylaws be amended to provide the Board with discretion to establish categories of membership and that bylaws directives stating that there be certain categories of membership be repealed.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>MOTION: That the bylaws be so amended.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of proposer__rsqb__</inline.instr> suggested that consideration of the bylaws amendment regarding membership categories be delayed until a committee was appointed to review the bylaws and suggest all needed revisions thereto so that all bylaws changes could be dealt with at one time.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>The motion was tabled.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>Action: President, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of president__rsqb__</inline.instr>, is to search for a willing and qualified person to serve as chair of a bylaws study committee and to determine the most appropriate method of determining how similar corporations have fashioned their bylaws.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>9.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">

</form.para>

<name.block>
<designator>A</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>E-mail list.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of reporter__rsqb__</inline.instr> reported that our e-mail list continues to show a growth in its subscriber base and that <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of persons__rsqb__</inline.instr> persons were now subscribers. <inline.instr>__lsqb__He/She__rsqb__</inline.instr> briefly discussed the problem of abusive postings by a small number of subscribers.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>Action: <inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of president__rsqb__</inline.instr> will study and report back on the pros and cons of converting the list into a monitored list as a remedy for abusive posters.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>The Board agreed that the content of postings should deal with scientific and technical issues only and that job postings and sharing of job openings are not appropriate.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>B</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>Budget</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>A proposed budget for the forthcoming year distributed to the Board by e-mail prior to the meeting was discussed. A number of changes were approved by the Board based on availability of funds, including the allocation of an additional $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of additional sum for promotional activities__rsqb__</inline.instr> for promotional activities and a <inline.instr>__lsqb__percentage of increase in reimbursement__rsqb__</inline.instr>% increase in reimbursement of individual board members' transportation and lodging expenses in connection with board meetings.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>MOTION: That the Board approve the Budget as presented, with changes as discussed.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>The motion passed by a vote of 7 to 2.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<form.text>Action: The budget as adopted will be published in the newsletter. Our Treasurer, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of treasurer__rsqb__</inline.instr>, will provide a brief narrative statement to place the changes from the current year's budget in context.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>10.</form.text>
</form.para>

<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|44|31:43">
<para.text>
Generally, any important action of a corporation through its directors should be recorded in the minutes of the Board.
</para.text>
</para>
</note.group>

<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block>
<label>&sect;</label>
<designator>31:44</designator>
<name>Minutes of subsequent meeting of board of directors<sep/> Adoption of conflict of interest policy</name>
</outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>

<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Ic70695e0181b11e68c12afa7f3a24041">
<form.name.block>
<name>MINUTES OF THE <inline.instr>__lsqb__ORDINAL NUMBER OF MEETING__rsqb__</inline.instr> MEETING OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF <inline.instr>__lsqb__NAME OF CORPORATION__rsqb__</inline.instr></name>
</form.name.block>
<form.line align="l">
</form.line>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|45|31:44">
<form.text>
The Board of Directors of <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of corporation__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> held its <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__ordinal number of meeting__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> meeting at <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__location of meeting__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> on <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__date of meeting__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>.
</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|45|31:44">
<form.text>
The following directors, constituting a quorum of the full board, were present at the meeting: <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__names of directors__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>.
</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|45|31:44">
<form.text>
The following directors were absent: <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__[names of absent directors__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>/None].
</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.line align="l">
</form.line>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|45|31:44">
<form.text>
The minutes of the <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__ordinal number of meeting__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> meeting of the corporation were read. Upon a motion duly made, seconded and unanimously carried, it was
</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|45|31:44">
<form.text>
RESOLVED, the minutes of the <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__ordinal number of meeting__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> meeting of the corporation are accepted and made part of the corporation's records.
</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.line align="l">
</form.line>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|45|31:44">
<form.text>
<inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of officer__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>, <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__title of officer__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> of <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of corporation__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>, presented to the board members a written Conflict of Interest Policy to be adopted by the Corporation. Upon a motion duly made, seconded and unanimously carried, it was
</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|45|31:44">
<form.text>
RESOLVED, that the corporation adopts the Conflict of Interest Policy and to make it part of the Bylaws of the Organization.
</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|45|31:44">
<form.text>
Because there was no further business to come before the meeting, upon a motion duly made, seconded and unanimously carried, the meeting was adjourned.
</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.line align="l">

<form uuid="Ic706bcf0181b11e68c12afa7f3a24041">
<form.para>
<form.text>A special meeting of the Board of Directors of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of corporation__rsqb__</inline.instr> was held on <inline.instr>__lsqb__date of meeting__rsqb__</inline.instr> at <inline.instr>__lsqb__time of day__rsqb__</inline.instr> at <inline.instr>__lsqb__location of meeting__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr>, N.Y. <inline.instr>__lsqb__specification of ZIP code__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|46|31:45">
<form.text>
All of the Directors being present, the meeting was called to order by the Chair. The Chair stated the Corporation's need to obtain signature cards from the bank. After advising the Directors of the convenience of several banks near the Corporation's place of business and upon a motion duly made, seconded and unanimously carried, it was
</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|46|31:45">
<form.text>
RESOLVED, that the Corporation's bank should be <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of bank__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>, <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__specification of branch__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>, instructing the Treasurer to proceed with the opening of the checking account.
</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|46|31:45">
<form.text>
RESOLVED, that all officers should have their signatures registered with the bank and that the signing of checks must include only one officer signature.
</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|46|31:45">
<form.text>
There being no further business to come before the meeting, upon motion duly made, seconded and unanimously carried, the meeting was adjourned.
</form.text>
</form.para>

<section.front><outline.name.block>
<label>&sect;</label>
<designator>31:45.40</designator>
<name>Resolution authorizing officers to open bank accounts</name>
</outline.name.block>
</section.front>
<section.body><form>

<form.para date.updated="1" date.trace="1">
<form.text>RESOLVED, that the officers of the Corporation be, and each of them acting alone hereby is, authorized and directed, in the name and on behalf of the Corporation, to open such accounts with such banking institutions as they, or any one of them, deems necessary or appropriate to conduct the business of the Corporation; that the Corporation hereby adopts, as though the same were presented herewith, any standard form of resolution required by any banking institution in order for the Corporation to establish an account with such banking institution; and that the officers be, and each of them acting alone hereby is, authorized and empowered to certify the adoption of any such resolution and is directed to record any resolutions so certified in the Corporation's minute book.</form.text>
</form.para>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry date.trace="1"><ref.text> <tk>West's Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3423</tk></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry date.trace="1"><ref.text> <tk>West's Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3430</tk></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>

<designator>31:45</designator>
<name>50 Resolution t o a mend c ertificate of i ncorporation to i ncrease n umber of d irectors</name>
</outline.name.block>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form.para date.updated="1" date.trace="1">
<form.text>WHEREAS the Board of Directors of <inline.instr>[name of corporation]</inline.instr>, has met on <inline.instr>[date of meeting]</inline.instr> pursuant to notice duly given pursuant to the Bylaws: and</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para date.updated="1" date.trace="1">
<form.text>WHEREAS the Board of Directors desires to amend the certificate of incorporation of <inline.instr>[name of corporation]</inline.instr> to provide for a maximum number of directors of <inline.instr>[new maximum number of directors]</inline.instr> in place of the current maximum of <inline.instr>[current maximum number of directors]</inline.instr>; it is</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para date.updated="1" date.trace="1">
<form.text>RESOLVED that the amendment of the certificate of incorporation of <inline.instr>[name of corporation]</inline.instr> is approved to provide that the number of directors shall be no less than <inline.instr>[minimum number of directors]</inline.instr> and no more than <inline.instr>[new maximum number of directors]</inline.instr>; and it is further</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para date.updated="1" date.trace="1">
<form.text>RESOLVED that the <inline.instr>[title of officer]</inline.instr> of <inline.instr>[name of corporation]</inline.instr> is authorized to file such amendment in substantially the form annexed to this Resolution.</form.text>
</form.para>

</outline.name.block>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form.para date.updated="1" date.trace="1">
<form.text>WHEREAS, <inline.instr>[name of corporation]</inline.instr> is a not-for-profit corporation duly organized and validly existing under the laws of the State of New York; and</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para date.updated="1" date.trace="1">
<form.text>WHEREAS, in accordance with the Bylaws of <inline.instr>[name of corporation]</inline.instr>, at its annual meeting the Board of Directors (the "Board") has elected officers and committee members to serve until the Board's next annual meeting.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para date.updated="1" date.trace="1">
<form.text>NOW THEREFORE BE IT RESOLVED</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para date.updated="1" date.trace="1">
<form.text>1. The Board hereby elects the following persons to the offices set forth opposite their names until their successors are elected and assume office: <inline.instr>[list of names and titles of officers]</inline.instr></form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para date.updated="1" date.trace="1">
<form.text>2. The Board hereby elects the following persons to the <inline.instr>[name of committee 1]</inline.instr> Committee to service until their successors are elected: <inline.instr>[list of names of committee members 1]</inline.instr></form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para date.updated="1" date.trace="1">
<form.text>3. The Board hereby elects the following persons to the <inline.instr>[name of committee 2]</inline.instr> Committee to service until their successors are elected: <inline.instr>[list of names of committee members 2]</inline.instr></form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para date.updated="1" date.trace="1">
<form.text>4. The <inline.instr>[titles of officers]</inline.instr> of <inline.instr>[name of corporation]</inline.instr> are each hereby authorized and directed to execute all documents on behalf of <inline.instr>[name of corporation]</inline.instr> which may be necessary to further the intent of this Resolution and perform such acts as may be necessary to implement the provisions of this Resolution.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para date.updated="1" date.trace="1">
<form.text>This Resolution will take effect immediately.</form.text>
</form.para>

<name>70 Written consent in lieu of board meeting</name>
</outline.name.block>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form date.updated="1" date.trace="1">
<form.name.block>
<name>Written Consent in Lieu of Meeting of the Members of the Board of Directors</name>
</form.name.block>
<form.para date.updated="1" date.trace="1">
<form.text><inline.instr>[Date of consent]</inline.instr></form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para date.updated="1" date.trace="1">
<form.text>The undersigned, being all of the members of the Board of Directors (the "Board") of <inline.instr>[name of corporation]</inline.instr>, a New York not-for profit corporation (the "Corporation"), hereby consents to the taking of the following actions and the adoption of the following resolutions and agrees that such actions and resolutions shall have the same force and effect as if duly adopted at a meeting of the directors duly called and held for the purpose:</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para date.updated="1" date.trace="1">
<form.text><inline.instr>[Recitation of resolutions]</inline.instr></form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para date.updated="1" date.trace="1">
<form.text>RESOLVED, that, on behalf of and in the name of the Corporation, the Officers be, and each of them acting alone hereby is, authorized and empowered to take any and all further action, to execute and deliver such documents, agreements or instruments and to take all further steps deemed by such Officers, or any one of them, to be necessary, appropriate or desirable to carry out the purposes and intent and to consummate the transactions contemplated by the foregoing resolutions; and it is hereby confirmed that all such action taken or to be taken by the Officers, or any one of them, was or will be taken as a representative of the Corporation.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para date.updated="1" date.trace="1">
<form.text>RESOLVED, that whenever it is provided in the foregoing resolutions that any person or persons may execute any document, take any action, or do any thing which such person or persons deem necessary or appropriate, the execution of such document, the taking of such action, or the doing of such thing shall be deemed conclusive evidence that the execution, taking, or doing thereof, as the case may be, is deemed by such person or persons to be necessary or appropriate.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para date.updated="1" date.trace="1">
<form.text>RESOLVED, that any actions taken by the Officers, or any representatives thereof, or any of them, prior to the adoption of these resolutions which are within the authority conferred hereby be, and they hereby are, ratified, confirmed, authorized, accepted and approved.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para date.updated="1" date.trace="1">
<form.text>RESOLVED, that this consent be filed with the records of the Corporation.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para date.updated="1" date.trace="1">
<form.text>IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the undersigned has executed this consent as of the date first set forth above.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.line date.updated="1" date.trace="1">
<form.text>Dated: <inline.instr>[date of consent]</inline.instr></form.text>
</form.line>
<form.line date.updated="1" date.trace="1">
<form.text><inline.instr>[Names of directors]</inline.instr></form.text>
</form.line>
</form>

<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block>
<label>&sect;</label>
<designator>31:47</designator>
<name>Bylaws<sep/> Nonprofit corporation</name>
</outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Ic7075930181b11e68c12afa7f3a24041">
<form.unit>
<form.para>
<form.text>ARTICLE 1 PURPOSE</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of corporation__rsqb__</inline.instr> (the “Corporation”) is created and shall be operated exclusively to <inline.instr>__lsqb__statement of purpose__rsqb__</inline.instr>, consistent with the requirements of <st>501(c)(3) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 (the “Code”)</st>.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>ARTICLE 2 BOARD OF DIRECTORS</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>2</designator>
<name>1.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text>General Powers. The management, control and operation of the affairs and properties of the Corporation are vested in the board of directors of the Corporation (the “Board”).</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>2</designator>
<name>2.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text>Number and Qualifications of Directors.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text>The Board shall consist of no fewer than three (3) and no more than <inline.instr>__lsqb__text number of maximum directors__rsqb__</inline.instr> (<inline.instr>__lsqb__number of maximum directors__rsqb__</inline.instr>) persons (the “Directors”). The exact number of Directors shall be set from time to time by resolution of the Board.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text>The Directors shall consist of persons who support the purpose of the Corporation. Other qualifications for Directors and criteria for the selection process may be established from time to time by the Board.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>2</designator>
<name>3.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text>Election. The Directors shall be elected by the Board at its Annual Meeting. The Board shall elect the number of Directors necessary to maintain staggered terms pursuant to Section 2.4, and such additional persons as may be necessary to fill unexpired terms each year.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>2</designator>
<name>4.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text>Term. Each Director shall serve a term of <inline.instr>__lsqb__text number of years__rsqb__</inline.instr> (<inline.instr>__lsqb__number of years__rsqb__</inline.instr>) years or until such Director's successor is appointed and qualified. If determined by the Board, the terms of the initial Board may be staggered so that the terms of future directors expire in different years. Directors may be reappointed for successive terms. When vacancies on the Board occur by reason of death, resignation, failure of qualification, or otherwise, the number shall be reduced by such vacancies until qualified replacements are appointed. Replacements shall be selected by the Board to fill the unexpired term.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>2</designator>
<name>5.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text>Resignation and Removal. A resignation by a Director must be in writing and is effective when received by the Secretary. Any Director may be removed from the Board for any reason by a vote of two-thirds (2/3) of all of the other Directors.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>2</designator>
<name>6.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text>Annual Meeting. The annual meeting of the Board shall be held in the <inline.instr>__lsqb__ordinal number of quarter__rsqb__</inline.instr> quarter of each year on such day and at such place and time as determined by the President (the “Annual Meeting”). The purpose of the Annual Meeting is to elect Directors and officers, and for the transaction of such other business as may come before the meeting.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>2</designator>
<name>7.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text>Regular and Special Meetings. Regular meetings of the Board shall be held at such times as the President may designate, at such other place as the President may designate. Special meetings of the Board may be called by the President or by <inline.instr>__lsqb__text number of directors__rsqb__</inline.instr> (<inline.instr>__lsqb__number of directors__rsqb__</inline.instr>) or more Directors at such time and place as the President or Directors calling the meeting may specify and in accordance with the notice requirements of Section 2.13.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>2</designator>
<name>8.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text>Quorum. To establish a quorum of the Board, a simple majority of all the Directors must be present.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>2</designator>
<name>9.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text>Manner of Acting. The act of the majority of the Directors present at a meeting at which a quorum is present is the duly authorized act of the Board, except where otherwise provided by law or these Bylaws.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>2</designator>
<name>10.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text>Action Without a Meeting. Any action required or permitted to be taken at a meeting of the Board may be taken without a meeting if a consent in writing or electronic setting forth the action to be taken is signed by all of the Directors, provided all Directors receive notice of the text of the written consent and of its effective date and time. Any such consent signed by all of the Directors has the same effect as a unanimous vote taken at a duly convened meeting of the Board at which a quorum is present and shall be filed with the minutes of the proceedings of the Board.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>2</designator>
<name>11.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text>Compensation. Directors will not be paid compensation for their services as Directors, provided that nothing in these Bylaws will be construed to prohibit payment of compensation to an individual who serves as a Director for services rendered to the Corporation in another capacity or reimbursement of expenses related to undertaking the Corporation's business.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>2</designator>
<name>12.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text>Meetings by Conference Telephone or Electronic Means of Communication. Members of the Board or any committee of the Board may conduct any regular or special meeting by use of a conference telephone or similar communications equipment or by electronic video screen communication provided: (1) all participating Directors may simultaneously hear each other's communications during the meeting and (2) each director can participate in all matters before the board, including, without limitation, the ability to propose, object to, and vote upon a specific action to be taken by the board or committee. Before the commencement of any business at a meeting at which any Directors do not participate in person, all participating Directors shall be informed that a meeting is taking place at which official business may be transacted. Participation in such manner shall constitute presence in person at such meeting for the purposes of these Bylaws.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>2</designator>
<name>13.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text>Notice. Notice need not be given of regular meetings of the Board, except a regular meeting at which the amendment or repeal of the Bylaws or the adoption of new Bylaws or the removal of a Director is to be considered requires <inline.instr>__lsqb__text number of days__rsqb__</inline.instr> (<inline.instr>__lsqb__number of days__rsqb__</inline.instr>) days' advance written notice. Special meetings must be preceded by at least <inline.instr>__lsqb__text number of hours__rsqb__</inline.instr> (<inline.instr>__lsqb__number of hours__rsqb__</inline.instr>) hours' notice to each Director if notice is given by electronic mail (“e-mail”), or <inline.instr>__lsqb__text number of hours__rsqb__</inline.instr> (<inline.instr>__lsqb__number of hours__rsqb__</inline.instr>) hours' notice if notice is given by mail or private carrier. Notice of meetings may be given by “e-mail”, provided, however, Directors who cannot receive notices electronically must receive notice via mail or personal delivery.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>2</designator>
<name>14.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text>Waiver of Notice. Notice of a meeting need not be given to any director who submits a waiver of notice whether before or after the meeting, or who attends the meeting without protesting, prior thereto or at its commencement, the lack of notice to him or her. Such waiver of notice may be written or electronic. If written, the waiver must be executed by the director signing such waiver or causing his or her signature to be affixed to such waiver by any reasonable means including but not limited to facsimile signature. If electronic, the transmission of the waiver must be sent by electronic mail and set forth, or be submitted with, information from which it can reasonably be determined that the transmission was authorized by the director.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>2</designator>
<name>15.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text>Director Conflict of Interest. The Board shall comply with the Conflict of Interest Policy attached as Exhibit <inline.instr>__lsqb__designation of exhibit__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>ARTICLE 3 OFFICERS</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>3</designator>
<name>1.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text>Officers. The officers of the Corporation are a President, a Vice-President, a Secretary, and a Treasurer. The officers shall be chosen from among the Directors. The same individual may serve as both the Secretary and Treasurer.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>3</designator>
<name>2.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text>Election and Term of Office. The Board shall elect the officers of the Corporation for <inline.instr>__lsqb__text number of years__rsqb__</inline.instr> (<inline.instr>__lsqb__number of years__rsqb__</inline.instr>) year terms, or until the Board again elects new officers, whichever occurs first.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>3</designator>
<name>3.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text>Removal. Any officer of the Corporation may be removed from office at any time for any reason by a two-thirds (2/3) vote of all of the Directors.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>3</designator>
<name>4.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text>President.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text>The President shall have general and active management of the affairs and property of the Corporation and shall see that all orders and resolutions of the Board are carried into effect. He or she shall preside at meetings of the Board. The President shall appoint a Director to preside over any meeting that he or she cannot attend.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text>The President may sign, with the other proper officer or agent of the Corporation authorized by the Board, any deeds, bonds, contracts or other instruments that the Board has authorized to be executed, and shall perform all duties incident to the office of President and such other duties as may be prescribed by the Board.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>3</designator>
<name>5.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text>Vice-President. The Vice President shall have such duties as determined from time to time by the Board. The Vice-President shall discharge the duties of the President in the event of his or her absence or inability to act.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>3</designator>
<name>6.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text>Secretary. The Secretary shall sign documents of the Corporation from time to time as required and shall see that minutes of the meetings of the Board are taken and maintained, see that notices are duly given in accordance with the provisions of these Bylaws or as required by law, and be custodian of the corporate records. The Secretary shall perform such other duties as may be assigned to the Secretary by the Board or President.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>3</designator>
<name>7.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text>Treasurer. The Treasurer shall see that an adequate and accurate accounting system is maintained and ensure that financial reports are presented to the Board. The Treasurer shall also advise the Board on the handling of the Corporation's monies and investments and perform such additional duties as may be assigned to the Treasurer by the Board or the President.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>ARTICLE 4 COMMITTEES OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS
<field>fvs.amt="1"</field></form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text>The Corporation may have an Executive Committee and such other committees as determined by the Board. If the Executive Committee is formed, it shall consist of at least three (3) Directors and be comprised of only Directors. The Executive Committee shall have and may exercise, when the Board is not in session and without specific delegation, all of the powers of the Board in the management of the affairs of the Corporation, except action with respect to election of officers or the filling of vacancies on the Board or on committees, the fixing of compensation of Directors for serving on the Board or on any committee, the amendment or repeal of the bylaws or the adoption of new bylaws, and the amendment or repeal of any resolution of the Board which by its terms shall not be so amendable or repealable.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text>Any other committee that does not consist entirely of Directors shall be chaired by a Director and include as many non-Director volunteers as the Board desires. Any other committee that does not consist entirely of Directors shall have only the authority delegated to it by the Board.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>ARTICLE 5 CONTRACTS, CHECKS, DEPOSITS AND FUNDS</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>5</designator>
<name>1.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text>Checks, Contracts. The Board is authorized to select such depositories as it shall deem proper for the funds of the Corporation and shall determine who shall be authorized on behalf of the Corporation to sign bills, notes, receipts, acceptances, endorsements, checks, releases, contracts and documents.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>5</designator>
<name>2.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text>Books and Accounts. The Corporation shall keep or cause to be kept correct and complete books and records of account and also keep minutes of the proceedings of the Board and its committees. In addition, the Corporation shall cause to be filed the necessary reports, tax returns or other documents as may be required by law on its own behalf.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>ARTICLE 6 INDEMNIFICATION</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text>The Corporation shall, to the fullest extent authorized by <st>N.Y. Not-for-Profit Corporation Law Article 7</st>, indemnify each Director and officer of the Corporation against reasonable expenses and against liability incurred by a Director or officer in a proceeding in which he or she was a party because he or she was a Director or officer of the Corporation. These indemnification rights shall not be deemed to exclude any other rights to which the Director or officer may otherwise be entitled. The Corporation shall indemnify any employee who is not a Director or officer of the Corporation, to the extent the employee has been successful on the merits or otherwise in defense of a proceeding, for all reasonable expenses incurred in the proceeding if the employee was a party because he or she was an employee of the Corporation. The Corporation may, to the fullest extent authorized by <st>N.Y. Not-for-Profit Corporation Law Article 7</st>, indemnify, reimburse, or advance expenses of Directors, officers, or employees.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>ARTICLE 7 FISCAL YEAR AND TERM YEAR</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text>The fiscal year of the Corporation is <inline.instr>__lsqb__start date of fiscal year__rsqb__</inline.instr> through <inline.instr>__lsqb__end date of fiscal year__rsqb__</inline.instr>. The terms of the officers and Directors shall be the calendar year, unless otherwise determined by the Board.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>ARTICLE 8 AMENDMENTS TO THE BYLAWS</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text>These Bylaws may be amended or repealed and new Bylaws may be adopted by the affirmative vote of two-thirds (2/3) of all of the Directors, provided that notice of the meeting is given stating the proposed amendment, repeal or new Bylaws to be considered.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para>
<form.text>ARTICLE 9 DISSOLUTION</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|48|31:47">
<form.text>The Corporation shall be dissolved upon the affirmative vote of two-thirds (2/3) of all Directors of the Corporation. Upon dissolution, the assets shall be distributed in accordance with the Corporation's <inline.instr>__lsqb__Certificate of Incorporation/[specification of other document__rsqb__</inline.instr>].</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.unit>
<note.block>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><tk>West's Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3384</tk></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>
</form>
</section.body>
</section>

<outline.name.block>

<name>Bylaws<sep/> Nonprofit corporation<sep/> Certificates of membership</name>
</outline.name.block>
<online.view>

<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Ic7086aa0181b11e68c12afa7f3a24041">
<form.unit>
<form.para>
<form.text>BYLAWS OF A NEW YORK NOT-FOR-PROFIT CORPORATION</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<label>Section</label>
<designator>1</designator>
<name>1</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|49|31:48">
<form.text>The principal office of this corporation in the State of New York shall be located at <inline.instr>__lsqb__office address of corporation__rsqb__</inline.instr>, in <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of county__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<label>Section</label>
<designator>1</designator>
<name>2</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|49|31:48">
<form.text>The corporation may have such other offices, either within or without the County of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of county__rsqb__</inline.instr>, State of New York, as the Board of Directors may, from time to time, determine.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<label>Section</label>
<designator>2</designator>
<name>1</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|49|31:48">
<form.text>The corporation shall have one class of members, and no more than one membership may be held by any one person. The rights and privileges of all members shall be equal. Each member shall be entitled to one vote.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<label>Section</label>
<designator>2</designator>
<name>2</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|49|31:48">
<form.text>Any individual or organization that pays the dues as provided below and that agrees to be bound by the certificate of incorporation of this corporation, by these bylaws, and by such rules and regulations as the directors may, from time to time, adopt is eligible for membership in this corporation.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<label>Section</label>
<designator>2</designator>
<name>3</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|49|31:48">
<form.text>The directors shall, from time to time, prescribe the form and manner in which application may be made for membership.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<label>Section</label>
<designator>2</designator>
<name>4</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|49|31:48">
<form.text>No member shall have any right, title, or interest in any of the property or assets, including any earnings or investment income of this corporation, nor shall any of such property or assets be distributed to any member on its dissolution or winding up.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<label>Section</label>
<designator>2</designator>
<name>5</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|49|31:48">
<form.text>No member of this corporation shall be personally liable for any of its debts, liabilities, or obligations, nor shall any member be subject to any assessment.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<label>Section</label>
<designator>2</designator>
<name>6</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|49|31:48">
<form.text>Membership in this corporation is nontransferable. Membership shall terminate on the resignation or death of a member or on a member's failure to pay the dues required in these bylaws within <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of days__rsqb__</inline.instr> days of the due date. A member whose membership has been terminated may apply for reinstatement in the same manner as application is made for initial membership.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<label>Section</label>
<designator>3</designator>
<name>1</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|49|31:48">
<form.text>The Board of Directors may provide for the issuance of certificates evidencing membership in the corporation, which shall be of such form as may be determined by the Board. Such certificates shall be signed by the President or Vice President or by the Secretary or an Assistant Secretary and shall be sealed with the seal of the corporation. All certificates evidencing membership shall be consecutively numbered. The name and address of each member and the date of issuance of the certificate shall be entered on the records of the corporation. If any certificate shall become lost, mutilated, or destroyed, a new certificate may be issued to replace it on such terms and conditions as the Board of Directors may determine.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<label>Section</label>
<designator>3</designator>
<name>2</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|49|31:48">
<form.text>If the Board of Directors shall have provided for the issuance of certificates of membership under the provisions of Section 3.1 of this Article, then, when a person has been elected to membership and has paid any initiation fee and dues that may then be required, such a certificate shall be issued in the name of and delivered to the new member by the Secretary.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<label>Section</label>
<designator>4</designator>
<name>1</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|49|31:48">
<form.text>The Board of Directors may determine, from time to time, the amount of initiation fee, if any, and the amount of annual dues payable to the corporation by members.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<label>Section</label>
<designator>4</designator>
<name>2</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|49|31:48">
<form.text>Dues shall be payable in advance on the <inline.instr>__lsqb__ordinal number of day__rsqb__</inline.instr> day of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of month__rsqb__</inline.instr> in each fiscal year. Dues of new members shall be prorated from the first day of the month in which such new member is elected to membership for the remainder of the fiscal year of the corporation and shall be payable, together with any initiation fee, at the time the new member is elected to membership.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<label>Section</label>
<designator>4</designator>
<name>3</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|49|31:48">
<form.text>When any member shall be in default in the payment of fees or dues for a period of <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of months__rsqb__</inline.instr> months from the beginning of the fiscal year or period in which such dues become payable, that person's membership may be terminated by the Board of Directors.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<label>Section</label>
<designator>5</designator>
<name>1</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|49|31:48">
<form.text>An annual meeting of members shall be held at <inline.instr>__lsqb__time of annual meeting__rsqb__</inline.instr>, on the <inline.instr>__lsqb__ordinal number of day__rsqb__</inline.instr> day in <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of month__rsqb__</inline.instr> in each year, beginning with the year <inline.instr>__lsqb__identification of year__rsqb__</inline.instr>, at <inline.instr>__lsqb__place of annual meeting__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of county__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr>, or at such other place or places as the Board of Directors may designate, from time to time, by resolution. Appropriate for consideration at such meetings shall be the election of directors and such other corporate business as may come before the meeting. If the day fixed for the annual meeting shall be a legal holiday in New York State, such meeting shall be held on the next succeeding business day. If the election of directors shall not be held on the day designated for an annual meeting or at any adjournment of such a meeting, the Board of Directors shall cause the election to be held at a special meeting of members conducted as soon as may be convenient.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<label>Section</label>
<designator>5</designator>
<name>2</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|49|31:48">
<form.text>Special meetings of members may be called by the President, the Board of Directors, or not less than one-twentieth of such members as may be qualified to vote.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<label>Section</label>
<designator>5</designator>
<name>3</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|49|31:48">
<form.text>The Board of Directors may designate any place, either within or without New York State, as the place of meeting for any annual or special meeting of members. If no designation is made, the place of meeting shall be <inline.instr>__lsqb__place of meeting__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of county__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr>. However, if all members shall meet at any time and place, either within or without New York State, and consent to the holding of a meeting, such meeting shall be valid without call or notice, and at such meeting any corporate action may be taken.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<label>Section</label>
<designator>5</designator>
<name>4</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|49|31:48">
<form.text>Written or printed notice stating the place, day, and hour of any meeting of members shall be delivered, personally, by mail, or by facsimile telecommunications or by electronic mail, to each member entitled to vote at such meeting, not less than <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of days__rsqb__</inline.instr> nor more than <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of days__rsqb__</inline.instr> days before the date of such meeting, by or at the direction of the President, Secretary, or such officers or persons as are calling the meeting. In the case of special meetings or when required by these bylaws or bylaw, the purpose or purposes for which the meeting is called shall be stated in the notice. If sent by mail, a notice of meeting is given when deposited in the United States mail, postage prepaid, addressed to the member at the member's address as it appears on the records of the corporation at the time of mailing. If sent by facsimile telecommunication or mailed electronically, such notice is given when directed to the member's fax number or electronic mail address as it appears on the record of members, or, to such fax number or other electronic mail address as filed with the secretary of the corporation.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<label>Section</label>
<designator>5</designator>
<name>5</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|49|31:48">
<form.text>Any action required or permitted to be taken at any meeting of members may be taken without such meeting if a consent in writing or electronic, setting forth the action to be taken, shall be signed or, if electronic, sent by electronic mail and set forth, or be submitted with, information from which it can reasonably be determined that the transmission was authorized, by all members entitled to vote with respect thereto.</form.text>
</form.para>

<name>6</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|49|31:48">
<form.text>Members holding <inline.instr>__lsqb__percentage of total votes__rsqb__</inline.instr>% of the total votes which may be cast at any meeting shall constitute a quorum at such meeting. If a quorum is not present at any meeting of members, a majority of those present may adjourn the meeting, from time to time, without further notice.</form.text>
</form.para>

No proxy shall be valid after <inline.instr>__lsqb__specification of time period__rsqb__</inline.instr> from its date of execution unless otherwise provided in the proxy.</form.text>
</form.para>

<designator>5</designator>
<name>9</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|49|31:48">
<form.text>Each member shall be entitled to one vote. If an organization is a member, the organization shall designate one person who shall have the right to exercise the organization's voting rights.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<label>Section</label>
<designator>5</designator>
<name>10</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|49|31:48">
<form.text>At any election for directors of this corporation, each and every member entitled to vote may cumulate that member's vote and give one candidate a number of votes equal to the number of directors to be elected, or each member may distribute that member's votes among as many candidates for director as the member thinks proper.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|49|31:48">
<form.text>The candidates for director receiving the highest number of votes up to the number of directors to be elected will be deemed to be elected.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>

<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|49|31:48">
<form.text>Except as otherwise provided in the certificate of incorporation or bylaw, the powers of this corporation shall be exercised, its properties controlled, and its affairs conducted by the Board of Directors, which may, however, delegate the performance of any duties or the exercise of any powers to such officers and agents as the Board may, from time to time, by resolution, designate.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|49|31:48">
<form.text>Management of income property. As described in ARTICLE EIGHT, the Board of Directors may determine, by resolution from time to time duly adopted, to delegate, in whole or in part, the management, investment, and disposition of the property of the corporation for the purpose of earning an income from that property, as distinguished from the matter of applying property and funds to charitable purposes, to a finance committee consisting of not less than three members of the board <inline.instr>__lsqb__[who shall be elected by majority vote thereof/[specification of method of election__rsqb__</inline.instr>], or to one or more trust companies or banks duly authorized to conduct a trust or banking business under the laws of New York.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(c)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|49|31:48">
<form.text>Common trust funds. The Board of Directors may, by resolution from time to time duly adopted, establish one or more common trust funds for the purpose of investing the corporation's funds and those of any <inline.instr>__lsqb__religious/beneficial/charitable/educational__rsqb__</inline.instr> institution affiliated with the corporation, whether the corporation holds such funds or property as a fiduciary or otherwise, subject to such terms and conditions as are set forth in the certificate of incorporation of this corporation and by law.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>

<name.block>
<designator>(a)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|49|31:48">
<form.text>Whenever a vacancy exists on the Board of Directors, whether by death, resignation, or otherwise, the vacancy shall be filled <inline.instr>__lsqb__by appointment of a new director by the president of the corporation, and if that power is not exercised with in [number of days__rsqb__</inline.instr> days after the president receives notice of the vacancy, by appointment by a majority of the remaining directors at a regular or special meeting of the board/<inline.instr>__lsqb__specification of other method of filling up vacancy__rsqb__</inline.instr>]. Any person appointed or elected to fill the vacancy of a director shall have the same qualifications as were required of the director whose office was vacated.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(b)</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|49|31:48">
<form.text>Any director may be removed, with or without cause, by the vote of two-thirds of the members of the Board of Directors at a special meeting called for that purpose. At any such meeting, any vacancy caused by the removal may be filled as stated above.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>(c)</designator>
</name.block>

<form.text>Any person <inline.instr>__lsqb__appointed/elected__rsqb__</inline.instr> to fill a vacancy in the Board of Directors shall hold office for the unexpired term of <inline.instr>__lsqb__his/her__rsqb__</inline.instr> predecessor in office, subject to the power of removal stated above.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>

Notice of such meetings shall be signed by the <inline.instr>__lsqb__secretary/[title of officer__rsqb__</inline.instr>] and mailed to each director at the address last recorded on the books of the corporation, not less than <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of days__rsqb__</inline.instr> nor more than <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of days__rsqb__</inline.instr> days before the date of the meeting. However, this requirement may be waived by resolution of the Board of Directors.</form.text>

In such event, <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of days__rsqb__</inline.instr>-days written notice to each director shall be deemed sufficient.</form.text>
</form.para>

<form.item>
<name.block>

</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|49|31:48">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__A majority of board of directors/[Text number of directors__rsqb__</inline.instr> directors] shall constitute a quorum for the transaction of business at any meeting of the Board. However, if less than a majority of the directors are present at any meeting, a majority of the directors present may adjourn the meeting from time to time without further notice.</form.text>

</form.para>
