<designator>D.</designator>
<name>Miscellaneous Agreements</name>
</outline.name.block>
</front>
<analytical.level.body>
<section.block>
<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block>
<label>&sect;</label>
<designator>31:96</designator>
<name>Contract to provide management services to charitable organization</name>
</outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>CML</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NUC</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Ic711b970181b11e68c12afa7f3a24041">
<form.para>
<form.text>Whereas <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> is a New York corporation that is experienced in and offers management services to charitable organizations;</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text>
Whereas <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> is a nonprofit <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__association/corporation/[type of entity__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>] and is largely operated by volunteers;
</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text>
Therefore, in consideration of the mutual promises contained in this agreement and other good and valuable consideration, the adequacy and receipt of which are hereby acknowledged, <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> and <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> hereby agree as follows:
</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>1</designator>
<name>Term.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text>This agreement shall be for term of <inline.instr>__lsqb__[number of years__rsqb__</inline.instr> years/<inline.instr>__lsqb__number of months__rsqb__</inline.instr> months] from the date hereof and shall be automatically renewed for successive additional periods of <inline.instr>__lsqb__[number of years__rsqb__</inline.instr> years/<inline.instr>__lsqb__number of months__rsqb__</inline.instr> months] each unless earlier terminated as provided for in this agreement.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>2</designator>
<name>Services to Be Provided.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text>During the term of this agreement, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall manage the affairs of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>, furnishing to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> the specific services, facilities, and personnel set forth in Exhibit <inline.instr>__lsqb__designation of exhibit__rsqb__</inline.instr> to this agreement, as it may be revised by mutual agreement from time to time.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>3</designator>
<name>Fees and Expenses.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> agrees to pay <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> in consideration of the services to be furnished by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr>, set forth in Exhibit <inline.instr>__lsqb__designation of exhibit__rsqb__</inline.instr> attached this agreement, the fees specified in Exhibit <inline.instr>__lsqb__designation of exhibit__rsqb__</inline.instr> attached to this agreement, as it may be revised by mutual agreement from time to time. <inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> agrees to pay monthly fees due to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> on or before the first of every month. Costs and expenses incurred by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> on behalf of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall be promptly reimbursed to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>. Fee or expense reimbursement amounts not paid by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> when due pursuant to this agreement shall accrue interest at a per annum rate of over the prime rate of interest as provided in the <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of reporting source__rsqb__</inline.instr>, or the maximum amount of interest allowable by law, whichever is less, from the due date until the date of payment.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>4</designator>
<name>Charity's Responsibilities.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> will be responsible for directing the activities of its Board and its committees and insuring that they made agreed-upon deadlines, travel and meeting commitments, and specific duties. The signature of the President of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> is required for all legal documents such as bank cards, tax forms, and hotel contracts. <inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> will be responsible for payment of the management fee and all reasonable, direct, out-of-pocket (line-item) expenses, such as telephone, postage, printing, typesetting, mailing labor, travel, or other outside services related to day-to-day operation of the enterprise.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text>Any problems that arise between a <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> member, exhibitor, speaker, or any other individual regarding an issue that is not easily resolved should be referred to the President of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>, who will mediate or refer to the proper Board member of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> for action.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>5</designator>
<name>Independent Contractor.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text>In carrying out its responsibilities under this agreement, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall at all times be an independent contractor. Nothing contained in this agreement shall be construed to create an employer&ndash;-employee relationship, a partnership, or joint venture between <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> and <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>6</designator>
<name>Indemnification.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall indemnify, defend, and hold <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> harmless against all claims, damages, suits, causes of action, judgments, and liabilities (and against all associated costs and expenses, including, without limitation, reasonable attorney's fees), arising from <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr>'s proper performance of its obligations under this agreement.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>7</designator>
<name>Termination.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text>This agreement may be terminated at any time by either party without cause, provided that written notice of termination given a specified in this agreement shall be delivered to the other party at least <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of days__rsqb__</inline.instr> days before the intended termination date.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>8</designator>
<name>Employment of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> Personnel.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> agrees that it will not, during the term of this agreement, and for <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of months__rsqb__</inline.instr> months after termination of this agreement, for any reason hire any person who had at any time during the <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of months__rsqb__</inline.instr>-months preceding the date of intended employment by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> been an employee of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> without the prior written approval of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr>. <inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> acknowledges that it is impossible for <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> to calculate at this time the damages <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> will suffer in the event of a breach of this paragraph by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>. Accordingly, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> and <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> agree that if <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> breaches this paragraph of the agreement, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> agrees to pay as liquidated damages to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> an amount equal to <inline.instr>__lsqb__percentage of annual salary__rsqb__</inline.instr>% of the annual salary paid by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> to the employee or employees of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> hired by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> in breach of this agreement during the <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of months__rsqb__</inline.instr> months immediately preceding the date the employee or employees are hired by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>. <inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> agrees that such amount is reasonable compensation to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> for <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>'s breach of this paragraph of the agreement. Such liquidated damages are to be paid to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> no later than the date on which the employment of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr>'s former employee or employees commences with <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>9</designator>
<name>Client Files.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text>All documents and files created by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> for <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall be the property of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>. Upon Termination of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr>'s services under this agreement, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> will return all of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>'s files and documents to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> at a location specified by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>. <inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall not be required to return <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>'s files and documents after termination of this agreement until all of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>'s financial obligations to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> under this agreement have been satisfied.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>10</designator>
<name>Notices.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text>Any notice required to be given under this agreement by either party to the other shall be sufficient if addressed and mailed, certified mail, postage prepaid, to the President of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> at his or her business address with copies to the members of the executive committee of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>. Any notice required to be given under this agreement to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall be sufficient if mailed by certified mail, postage prepaid, to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of authorized person__rsqb__</inline.instr> and <inline.instr>__lsqb__address of authorized person__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of county__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>11</designator>
<name>Applicable Law.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text>This agreement shall be governed by and construed in accord with the laws of the State of New York as if entered into and to be put fully performed in the State of New York.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>12</designator>
<name>Entire Agreement.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text>This agreement sets forth the entire agreement and understanding between the parties on the subject matter of disagreement and supersedes all prior discussions and negotiations between the parties. Neither party shall be bound by any conditions, definitions, representations, or warranties with respect to subject matter of this agreement other than those as expressly provided herein.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>13</designator>
<name>Amendment and Waiver.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text>No modification of this agreement shall be binding unless made in writing and executed by both parties. No waiver by either party of any breach or obligation of the other party under this agreement shall constitute a waiver of any other prior or subsequent breach or obligation.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>14</designator>
<name>Severability.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text>If any provision of this agreement is held by a court of competent jurisdiction to be contrary to law, the remaining provisions in this agreement shall remain in full force and effect.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>15</designator>
<name>Arbitration.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text>Any differences, controversies, or claims arising out of, or relating to this agreement or the breach thereof, shall be settled by arbitration in accordance with the Commercial Arbitration Rules of the American Arbitration Association. The determination of the arbitrators will be accepted and binding upon both parties and a judgment upon the award of the arbitrators may be entered in any court having jurisdiction thereof. <inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> and <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall each select one arbitrator, which two arbitrators shall issue a final, binding decision. The parties shall share equally the costs of such arbitration.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text>In witness whereof, the parties have executed this agreement by their duly authorized representatives as of the date first written above.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text>Any differences, controversies, or claims arising out of, or relating to this agreement or the breach thereof, shall be settled by arbitration in accordance with the Commercial Arbitration Rules of the American Arbitration Association. The determination of the arbitrators will be accepted and binding upon both parties and a judgment upon the award of the arbitrators may be entered in any court having jurisdiction thereof. <inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> and <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall each select one arbitrator, which two arbitrators shall issue a final, binding decision. The parties shall share equally the costs of such arbitration.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|100|31:96">
<form.text>In witness whereof, the parties have executed this agreement by their duly authorized representatives as of the date first written above.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>

</section>
<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block>
<label>&sect;</label>
<designator>31:97</designator>
<name>Contract to provide management services to charitable organization<sep/> With insurance clause</name>
</outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>CML</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NUC</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Ic7122ea0181b11e68c12afa7f3a24041">
<form.para>
<form.text>This is an agreement between <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr>, a corporation chartered in New York, to provide management and administrative services to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>, a nonprofit <inline.instr>__lsqb__association/corporation/[specification of entity__rsqb__</inline.instr>].</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>1</designator>
<name>SERVICES</name>
</name.block>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>A</designator>
<name>Routine Services.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall provide to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> the management and administrative services outlined in Attachment A for the duration of this agreement and any extensions thereof.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>B</designator>
<name>Special Project Services.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> may provide management and administrative services to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> for special projects that are not otherwise included within the scope of this agreement if <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> obtains preauthorization and approval for the provision of such special project services from <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>2</designator>
<name>SCOPE OF SERVICES</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text>The scope of the services to be provided by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> is outlined in Attachment A which is incorporated herein by reference.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>3</designator>
<name>REMUNERATION AND REIMBURSEMENT</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall pay to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> the sum of $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of monthly compensation__rsqb__</inline.instr> a month in compensation for routine services performed or to be performed by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr>. This compensation shall be payable <inline.instr>__lsqb__specification of terms of payment__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall pay to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> for special project services performed or to be performed in accordance with the agreement reached by the parties for the performance of such special project services.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall be promptly reimbursed for all expenses incurred by it in behalf of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>4</designator>
<name>PERSONNEL</name>
</name.block>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>A</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> will assign such support staff as it deems necessary to manage the day-to-day activities of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>. All personnel assigned to provide services to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> will be employed by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> and <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> assumes responsibility for their compensation and terms of employment. Employees of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> are not considered employees of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> within purview of Social Security accounts, workers' compensation laws, or in any other regard. All employees are bonded and will be bonded during the entire term of this contract and any extension thereof.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>B</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> agrees that it will not during the term of this agreement or for <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of months__rsqb__</inline.instr> months thereafter hire any executive or administrative personnel currently employed by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> without the express written approval of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of officer of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>5</designator>
<name>OFFICE LOCATION AND HOURS</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall provide for <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> an office to be located at <inline.instr>__lsqb__address of office__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of city__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of county__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr> or at such other location as <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> may choose. <inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall receive and transmit from this location mail, telephone calls, and e-mail messages in behalf of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr>. This office shall be open during normal business hours, which are <inline.instr>__lsqb__time of day business opens__rsqb__</inline.instr> to <inline.instr>__lsqb__time of day business closes__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__specification of time zone__rsqb__</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>__lsqb__Monday through Friday/[specification of days business is opened__rsqb__</inline.instr>], except for national holidays. to <inline.instr>__lsqb__Eastern/Central/Mountain/Pacific__rsqb__</inline.instr> time, Monday through Friday, except for national holidays.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.para>
<form.text>6 INTERNAL FINANCIAL CONTROLS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> agrees to exercise and maintain accounting and financial control over <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>'s cash receipts and expenditures in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles and standards.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>7</designator>
<name>OWNERSHIP OF CASH RECEIPTS</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text>All cash remittances received by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr>, including by way of example but not limited to membership dues, seminar and workshop registration fees, and income from the sale of publications, shall at all times remain the property of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>. <inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall segregate in deposits such receipts in a separate bank account or accounts maintained for <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>. In the event of termination of this agreement for any reason, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall probably forward to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> all cash-in-bank balances and receipts on hand owned by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>8</designator>
<name>TERM AND TERMINATION</name>
</name.block>
<form.unit>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>A</designator>
<name>Term.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text>The term of this agreement shall be <inline.instr>__lsqb__specification of time period__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>B</designator>
<name>Termination for Cause.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text>Either party may terminate this agreement for cause as a result of a breach or default in terms of this agreement. In the event of such a breach or default, the defaulting party must be provided written notice of the breach or default and given a reasonable period to be agreed upon by both parties, not to exceed <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of days__rsqb__</inline.instr> days, in which to cure the same. Failing in properly cure of the breach or default, this agreement may be immediately terminated upon written notice.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>C</designator>
<name>Termination at End of Term.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text>Either party may choose not to renew this agreement, with or without cause, by giving the other party written notice thereof <inline.instr>__lsqb__number of days__rsqb__</inline.instr> days prior to the end of the initial term or any renewal term thereof.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text>Upon termination, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall promptly return all books, records, supplies, and files of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>. Upon receipt of a final invoice stating the amounts owed, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall reimburse <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> for all expenses reasonably incurred on behalf of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> prior to the date of termination.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>D</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text>Notice required by Section 8B and C shall be given to the President of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>, to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of principal of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr>, or to any other person designated in writing from time to time by <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
</form.unit>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>9</designator>
<name>INFORMATION</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> will provide <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> with all the information necessary for <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> to provide the service as set forth in this agreement. All <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> information and data provided to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> is the sole and exclusive confidential property of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>. <inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall not at any time disclose such information or data to any person or entity without the written authorization of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr>. Upon termination of this agreement, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall deliver to <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> all such information and data and <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall not retain copies thereof.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>10</designator>
<name>INSURANCE</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text>Throughout the term of this agreement and any renewal or extension thereof, <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> shall maintain comprehensive general liability insurance for employees and <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> in the amount of $<inline.instr>__lsqb__dollar amount of general liability insurance__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>11</designator>
<name>INDEMNIFICATION</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr> hereby agrees to indemnify and hold <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> harmless from and against all losses or damages <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of nonprofit organization__rsqb__</inline.instr> made directly or indirectly sustained or incurred through the misconduct or negligence of <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of management firm__rsqb__</inline.instr>, its officers, or members. These indemnities are to be continuing and are to remain in force without intermission during the term of this agreement.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>12</designator>
<name>RESOLUTION OF DISPUTES</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text>Any or all disputes arising out of or relating to this agreement shall be determined by arbitration in accordance with the Commercial Rules of the American Arbitration Association and shall be conducted in <inline.instr>__lsqb__name of state__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>

<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">

</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>C</designator>
<name>Entire Agreement.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text>This is the entire agreement of the parties. All prior negotiations and representations are merged into this agreement. This agreement supersedes all prior agreements between the parties. No provisions of the agreement may be waived, modified, or terminated except by a written addition or modification to the agreement signed by both parties. No waiver of any breach under this agreement shall be deemed a waiver of any subsequent breach.</form.text>
</form.para>
</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>D</designator>
<name>Separability; Enforceability of Remaining Provisions.</name>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text>The invalidity or unenforceability of any provision of this agreement shall not affect the validity or enforceability of any other provision or of the agreement as a whole.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text>In witness, the parties have executed this agreement at <inline.instr>__lsqb__place of execution__rsqb__</inline.instr> on <inline.instr>__lsqb__date of agreement__rsqb__</inline.instr>.</form.text>
</form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text>The invalidity or unenforceability of any provision of this agreement shall not affect the validity or enforceability of any other provision or of the agreement as a whole.</form.text>

</name.block>

</name.block>

</name.block>

This analysis is to include insights garnered from Management Firm's experience working with its other clients without violating the confidentiality owed those clients.</form.text>

</form.item>
<form.item>
<name.block>
<designator>d</designator>
</name.block>

</name.block>

<designator>h</designator>
</name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">
<form.text>Assisting the Organization and its Treasurer in complying with all duties placed on them by federal and state tax law, rules, regulations, and revenue rulings. In performing this service and duty, the Management Firm shall, within the amounts authorized by the Organization's annual budget, retain accounting and legal services necessary to assure such compliance. The tax-related duties and services of the Management Firm shall include, but not be limited to, filing all required returns or other documents and paying all taxes in a timely manner.</form.text>

<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|101|31:97">

<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block>
<label>&sect;</label>
<designator>31:98</designator>
<name>Contract to provide management services to charitable organization<sep/> Provision<sep/> Independent contractor status</name>
</outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EMT</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>AMT</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>CLS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>CML</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NUC</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Ic71255b0181b11e68c12afa7f3a24041">
<form.name.block>
<name>Independent Contractor</name>
</form.name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f477b8b0b92511efa86bc22ba615bad8|102|31:98">
<form.text>
The relationship of <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of service provider__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> to <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of charitable organization__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> will be that of independent contractors and nothing set forth in the agreement will be deemed or construed to render the parties as joint venturers, partners or employer and employee. <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of service provider__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> personnel are neither employees nor agents of <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of charitable organization__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> and are not eligible to participate in any employment benefit plans or other conditions of employment available to <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of charitable organization__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>'s employees. <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of service provider__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> will be solely responsible for making or causing to be made all deductions and withholdings from its personnel's salaries and other compensation if personnel provide services to <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of charitable organization__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr>. <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of service provider__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> will have exclusive control over its personnel and over the labor and employee relations, and the policies relating to wages, hours, working conditions or other conditions of its personnel. <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__Name of service provider__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> will have the exclusive right to hire, transfer, suspend, lay off, recall, promote, assign, discipline, discharge and adjust grievances with its personnel. At any time, however, <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of charitable organization__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> will have the right to require <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of service provider__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> to remove from any <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of charitable organization__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> project, initiative, fund raiser or event, any personnel objectionable to <inline.instr><inline.instr>__lsqb__name of charitable organization__rsqb__</inline.instr></inline.instr> for any lawful reason.
</form.text>
</form.para>
<note.block>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><tk>West's Key Number Digest, Charities &key;40</tk></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>
